original: 'on te yang rjes su 'gro ba 'di gtso bo'i yon tan bzhin du byed pa med pa zhig yin zhes bya ba ni ma nges pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'on te yang rjes su 'gro ba 'di gtso bo'i yon tan bzhin du byed pa med pa zhig yin zhes bya ba ni ma nges pa nyid yin no //
translated: But if you say that this subsequent state is like the qualities of the primal substance, then it is not established.

original: yongs su 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs rnams la yang tshul 'di nyid sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs rnams la yang tshul 'di nyid sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: This same method should be applied to the arguments about transformation and so on.

original: gzhan yang gtso bo ni yod do zhes bya bar dam bca' ba'i don ci zhig yin ;
analyzed: gzhan yang gtso bo ni yod do zhes bya bar dam bca' ba'i don ci zhig yin ;
translated: Moreover, what is the meaning of the thesis ‚ÄúThe primal substance exists‚Äù?

original: ci chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyi rgyu gtso bo gcig pu yin nam /
analyzed: ci chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyi rgyu gtso bo gcig pu yin nam /
translated: Is it that the primal substance is the sole cause of Mahat and so on?

original: 'on te gtso bo ni chen po'i rgyu yin la chen po ni ngar 'dzin pa'i rgyu yin /üîΩngar 'dzin pa ni de tsam gyi'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa so so'i rgyu nyid yin /
analyzed: 'on te gtso bo ni chen po'i rgyu yin la chen po ni ngar 'dzin pa'i rgyu yin / ngar 'dzin pa ni de tsam gyi'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa so so'i rgyu nyid yin /
translated: Or is it that the primal substance is the cause of Mahat, Mahat is the cause of I-principle, and I-principle is the cause of just that much?

original: de la re shig rgyu gcig sngon du song ba las yin na ni rgyu rnams dang 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: de la re shig rgyu gcig sngon du song ba las yin na ni rgyu rnams dang 'gal ba yin te /
translated: In that regard, if it is the case that the primal substance is the cause of Mahat and so on, then it is contradictory that there are many causes.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: 'di la gang yod pa de dag ni rgyu tha dad par mthong ste /
analyzed: 'di la gang yod pa de dag ni rgyu tha dad par mthong ste /
translated: Whatever exists is seen to have different causes.

original: ji ltar sa ni bum pa'i rgyu yin la bum pa ni gyo du ma la sogs pa rnams kyi yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar sa ni bum pa'i rgyu yin la bum pa ni gyo du ma la sogs pa rnams kyi yin no //
translated: Just as the earth is the cause of the pot, and the pot is the cause of the shards, etc.

original: de bzhin du tsandan gyi ljon pa ni sdong po'i rgyu yin la sdong po ni dum bu'i rgyu yin pas rgyu gcig sngon du song ba las grub pa'i ngo bo ni med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du tsandan gyi ljon pa ni sdong po'i rgyu yin la sdong po ni dum bu'i rgyu yin pas rgyu gcig sngon du song ba las grub pa'i ngo bo ni med do //
translated: In the same way, the sandalwood tree is the cause of the trunk, and the trunk is the cause of the branches, and so on. Thus, there is no entity that is established from a single cause that has gone before.

original: des na rgyu gcig sngon du song ba las yod pa nyid mi 'byung bar rjes su dpag pas na med pa nyid rab tu bsgrubs pa yin pas chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo las bzlog pa bsgrubs pa yin no //üîΩde bzhin tha dad rgyu las kyang //
analyzed: des na rgyu gcig sngon du song ba las yod pa nyid mi 'byung bar rjes su dpag pas na med pa nyid rab tu bsgrubs pa yin pas chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo las bzlog pa bsgrubs pa yin no // de bzhin tha dad rgyu las kyang //
translated: Therefore, since it is inferred that existence does not arise from a single cause that has gone before, nonexistence is well established. Thus, the opposite of the intrinsic reality of the subject is established.üîΩThere is no example

original: 'byung bar 'dod pa'i dpe yod min /
analyzed: 'byung bar 'dod pa'i dpe yod min /
translated: of an effect that is different from its cause.

original: gtso bo ni chen po'i rgyu yin te /
analyzed: gtso bo ni chen po'i rgyu yin te /
translated: The primal substance is the cause of the great one,üîΩbecause of the relation of inherence.

original: rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir dper na ji lta bu zhig ces bya ba'i rigs gcig pa'i dngos po'i don rtag par gnas pa'i ngo bo ni med pas dpe ma grub pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir dper na ji lta bu zhig ces bya ba'i rigs gcig pa'i dngos po'i don rtag par gnas pa'i ngo bo ni med pas dpe ma grub pa nyid yin no //
translated: Since the meaning of the term ‚Äúentity‚Äù is not a permanent, enduring reality, the example is not established.

original: gal te yang 'dir bdag gis snod chag pa'i dum bu la sogs pa'i dpe smras pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te yang 'dir bdag gis snod chag pa'i dum bu la sogs pa'i dpe smras pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: But here, haven‚Äôt we already used the example of a broken pot, etc.?

original: @237a * // snod chag pa'i dum bu la sogs pa ni mi rtag pa yin la /
analyzed: @237a * // snod chag pa'i dum bu la sogs pa ni mi rtag pa yin la /
translated: The fragments of a broken pot, etc., are impermanent.

original: gtso bo nyid ni rtag pa'i chos can yin na ji ltar de dag 'dra ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: gtso bo nyid ni rtag pa'i chos can yin na ji ltar de dag 'dra ba yin zhe na /
translated: But the primal substance itself is permanent. How can they be similar?

original: de ci ltar rtag pa yin par sgrub pa'i phyir gzhan dag gis tshad ma smras pa /üîΩtsandan dum bur gyur pa na //
analyzed: de ci ltar rtag pa yin par sgrub pa'i phyir gzhan dag gis tshad ma smras pa / tsandan dum bur gyur pa na //
translated: In order to prove that it is permanent, others have stated the following valid cognition:üîΩThe sandalwood tree is not destroyed

original: nyams pa min par rtogs bya ste //
analyzed: nyams pa min par rtogs bya ste //
translated: When it becomes pieces.

original: stobs dang gzugs dang tshad la sogs //
analyzed: stobs dang gzugs dang tshad la sogs //
translated: Its power, form, size, and so on

original: nye bar gnas te bdag nyid bzhin //
analyzed: nye bar gnas te bdag nyid bzhin //
translated: Remain just as before.

original: tsandan zhes bya ba'i rdzas brtan par gnas bzhin du /
analyzed: tsandan zhes bya ba'i rdzas brtan par gnas bzhin du /
translated: The substance called sandalwood remains stable.

original: dum bu zhes bya ba'i chos kyi khyad par so sor 'byung bar gyur pa na sdong po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi khyad par mi mngon par gyur la dum bu mngon bar gyur ba de'i dus na yang tsandan la ni nyams pa med do zhes bya ba ni
analyzed: dum bu zhes bya ba'i chos kyi khyad par so sor 'byung bar gyur pa na sdong po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi khyad par mi mngon par gyur la dum bu mngon bar gyur ba de'i dus na yang tsandan la ni nyams pa med do zhes bya ba ni
translated: When the special quality called ‚Äúpiece‚Äù occurs separately, the special quality called ‚Äútrunk‚Äù disappears and the special quality called ‚Äúpiece‚Äù appears. At that time, there is no loss of sandalwood.

original: phyogs yin no //
analyzed: phyogs yin no //
translated: This is the position.

original: stobs nye bar gnas pa dang / gzugs nye bar gnas pa dang / tshad nye bar gnas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba rnams ni gtan tshigs te /
analyzed: stobs nye bar gnas pa dang / gzugs nye bar gnas pa dang / tshad nye bar gnas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba rnams ni gtan tshigs te /
translated: The reasons are: because the power remains, because the form remains, and because the measure remains.

original: nye bar gnas pa'i ngo bo ni nye bar gnas pa nyid do //
analyzed: nye bar gnas pa'i ngo bo ni nye bar gnas pa nyid do //
translated: The nature of remaining is remaining itself.

original: rigs gcig pa'i rgyu'i rang gi ngo bo nyid yongs su ma spangs pa'o ;
analyzed: rigs gcig pa'i rgyu'i rang gi ngo bo nyid yongs su ma spangs pa'o ;
translated: It is the non-abandonment of the nature of a cause belonging to the same class.

original: / de la stobs nye bar gnas pa ni tsandan dum bu la sogs par byas su zin kyang sman la sogs pa'i dgos pa la dri dang ro tha mi dad pas de ltar phan par 'gyur ba'i nus pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: / de la stobs nye bar gnas pa ni tsandan dum bu la sogs par byas su zin kyang sman la sogs pa'i dgos pa la dri dang ro tha mi dad pas de ltar phan par 'gyur ba'i nus pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: Among them, the power remains: even when sandalwood is made into pieces, etc., the ability to benefit through the undifferentiated smell and taste for the purpose of medicine, etc., remains.üîΩThe form remains: even when the sandalwood is made into pieces, etc., the form of the pieces, etc., is not different from the form of the sandalwood.

original: gzugs nye bar gnas pa ni dkar po la sogs par mthun pa'i gzugs nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs nye bar gnas pa ni dkar po la sogs par mthun pa'i gzugs nyid do //
translated: The form that is present is the form that is agreeable, such as white, etc.

original: tshad nye bar gnas pa ni tsandan gyi sdong po chen po la dum bu mang po nyid yod pa yin la /
analyzed: tshad nye bar gnas pa ni tsandan gyi sdong po chen po la dum bu mang po nyid yod pa yin la /
translated: The size that is present is the many parts of a large sandalwood tree,

original: chung ngu la ni dum bu yang nyung du 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: chung ngu la ni dum bu yang nyung du 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: and the few parts of a small one.

original: gang dang gang nye bar gnas pa yod pa de dang de ni med par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang dang gang nye bar gnas pa yod pa de dang de ni med par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: Whatever is present is not absent.

original: dper na dum bur ma byas pa'i tsandan de'i rang gi ngo bo bzhin no//
analyzed: dper na dum bur ma byas pa'i tsandan de'i rang gi ngo bo bzhin no//
translated: For example, the nature of that sandalwood that is not cut into pieces.

original: des na rgyu tha dad pa nyid la yang bdag la dpe yod pa bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na rgyu tha dad pa nyid la yang bdag la dpe yod pa bzhin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, even if the cause is different, the self has an example, just like that.

original: de la brjod par bya ste /üîΩnus pa'i bdag nyid nyid du de //
analyzed: de la brjod par bya ste / nus pa'i bdag nyid nyid du de //
translated: In response to that, it should be said:üîΩIf it exists as the nature of potential,

original: yod na sngar bzhin dpe mi 'grub //
analyzed: yod na sngar bzhin dpe mi 'grub //
translated: the example is not established as before.

original: gtso bo'i nus pa chen po la sogs pa'i dbye ba la yang yod na rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs yod par gyur kyang dngos po'i don mi gsal ba gzhan med pas bsgrub bya rjes su 'gro ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gtso bo'i nus pa chen po la sogs pa'i dbye ba la yang yod na rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs yod par gyur kyang dngos po'i don mi gsal ba gzhan med pas bsgrub bya rjes su 'gro ba ma yin te /
translated: If there were a division of the great power of the main principle and so on, then although there would be a reason such as following, since there is no other unclear meaning of the thing, the probandum is not followed.

original: dpe med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dpe med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no example.

original: gsal ba'i ngo bor de yod na'ang //
analyzed: gsal ba'i ngo bor de yod na'ang //
translated: If it existed in the nature of the manifest,

original: grub pa'i mtha' ni spang bar 'gyur //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' ni spang bar 'gyur //
translated: the philosophical position would be abandoned.

original: ci ste yang gsal ba'i ngo bos gtso bo dbye brag gi rjes su 'gro bar yod do zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste yang gsal ba'i ngo bos gtso bo dbye brag gi rjes su 'gro bar yod do zhe na /
translated: But if the main principle existed in the nature of the manifest, following the division,

original: grub @237b pa'i mtha' dang 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: grub @237b pa'i mtha' dang 'gal ba yin te /
translated: it would contradict the philosophical position.

original: lung las gtso bo ni mi gsal ba'o zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lung las gtso bo ni mi gsal ba'o zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is stated in scripture that the main principle is unmanifest.

original: gal te tsandan dang dum bu gcig pa nyid yin na de bzhin du bya ba dang byed bdag nyid kyang bya ba dang byed pa gcig pa nyid du sgrub par byed do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te tsandan dang dum bu gcig pa nyid yin na de bzhin du bya ba dang byed bdag nyid kyang bya ba dang byed pa gcig pa nyid du sgrub par byed do zhe na /
translated: If sandalwood and a piece are the same, then action and the agent are also established as the same action and agent.

original: de la yang /
analyzed: de la yang /
translated: In response to that,

original: bya dang byed pa gcig nyid du//
analyzed: bya dang byed pa gcig nyid du//
translated: action and agent are not the same.

original: sgrub na'ang smras pa'i tshul nyid yin //
analyzed: sgrub na'ang smras pa'i tshul nyid yin //
translated: If you prove that they are the same, you prove what is already established.

original: rigs mthun nyid la gcig nyid du //
analyzed: rigs mthun nyid la gcig nyid du //
translated: If you prove that they are the same in being of the same type,

original: sgrub na'ang grub pa sgrub pa yin //
analyzed: sgrub na'ang grub pa sgrub pa yin //
translated: you prove what is already established.

original: gal te rigs mthun pa nyid la bya ba dang byed pa gcig pa nyid du sgrub par byed na ni grub pa sgrub pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te rigs mthun pa nyid la bya ba dang byed pa gcig pa nyid du sgrub par byed na ni grub pa sgrub pa yin te /
translated: If you prove that they are the same in being of the same type, you prove what is already established.

original: de yang 'di ltar nas kyi sa bon las byung ba'i myu gu dang / sdong bu dang / sbubs dang / 'dab ma dang / snye ma dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa ni tha mi dad pa'i phyir gcig nyid yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de yang 'di ltar nas kyi sa bon las byung ba'i myu gu dang / sdong bu dang / sbubs dang / 'dab ma dang / snye ma dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa ni tha mi dad pa'i phyir gcig nyid yin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, a sprout, a stalk, a sheath, a leaf, a tassel, a grain, and so on, which arise from a barley seed, are the same in being of the same type, but they are not the same.

original: de las don gzhan rtogs na yang //
analyzed: de las don gzhan rtogs na yang //
translated: If you understand the meaning in a different way,

original: snga ma bzhin du skyon kun 'byung //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du skyon kun 'byung //
translated: all the faults stated earlier apply.

original: 'di ni sngar nyid du de kho na nyid kyi shes pa tshol ba'i rab tu byed par bya ba dang / byed pa dag gcig nyid du gyur na pha dang bu'i rnam par gzhag pa yang nyams par 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'di ni sngar nyid du de kho na nyid kyi shes pa tshol ba'i rab tu byed par bya ba dang / byed pa dag gcig nyid du gyur na pha dang bu'i rnam par gzhag pa yang nyams par 'gyur la /
translated: This has already been explained in the chapter on the search for the reality of the object and the means of knowledge. If the object and the means of knowledge were the same, the arrangement of father and son would be undermined.

original: rgyu dang / 'bras bu dang / byed pa po dang / las bstan pa yang med par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu dang / 'bras bu dang / byed pa po dang / las bstan pa yang med par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa yin no //
translated: and the teaching of cause, effect, agent, and action would not exist.

original: gang yang grangs can gang dag blo snga ma dag ni 'gag pa ma yin pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: gang yang grangs can gang dag blo snga ma dag ni 'gag pa ma yin pa nyid yin te /
translated: Now, those SƒÅ·πÉkhyas who say that the former cognitions do not cease

original: de ltar yod do zhes zer ba de la yang rim pa 'di nyid kyis dpyad par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de ltar yod do zhes zer ba de la yang rim pa 'di nyid kyis dpyad par bya ba yin te /
translated: but exist in that way should be analyzed in the same way.

original: gang rigs gcig pa nyid kyi rgyud rnam par gnas pas blo snga ma rnams da ltar yod pa nyid du sgrub na ni grub pa sgrub pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gang rigs gcig pa nyid kyi rgyud rnam par gnas pas blo snga ma rnams da ltar yod pa nyid du sgrub na ni grub pa sgrub pa nyid yin no //
translated: If it is established that the former cognitions exist in the present through the continuity of the same type, then it is the establishment of what is already established.

original: gal te mi 'gag pa nyid yin la yongs su gyur nas gcig pa nyid du 'dod do zhe na ni yul gzhan la 'byung ba med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te mi 'gag pa nyid yin la yongs su gyur nas gcig pa nyid du 'dod do zhe na ni yul gzhan la 'byung ba med par 'gyur ro //
translated: But if it is asserted that they are not ceased but transformed into one, then they would not arise in other objects.

original: ci ste 'byung na ni 'gag pa yin pas gcig nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: ci ste 'byung na ni 'gag pa yin pas gcig nyid ma yin no //
translated: But if they do arise, then they are ceased and not one.

original: gal te yang gzhan dag na re 'dir khyad par smras pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: gal te yang gzhan dag na re 'dir khyad par smras pas ci zhig bya /
translated: Now, if others say, ‚ÄúWhat is the point of making distinctions here?

original: dngos po thams cad gcig nyid yin te /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad gcig nyid yin te /
translated: All things are one.

original: bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang / gti mug gi bdag nyid du rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs rnams kyis bdag gis rab tu bsgrub pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang / gti mug gi bdag nyid du rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs rnams kyis bdag gis rab tu bsgrub pa yin no zhe na /
translated: and the reasonings of the self‚Äôs conformity with pleasure, pain, and delusion, etc.

original: de la yang /
analyzed: de la yang /
translated: But in response to that,üîΩit is said:

original: bde dang sdug bsngal la sogs kun //
analyzed: bde dang sdug bsngal la sogs kun //
translated: All pleasure, pain, etc.

original: gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid yin //üîΩzhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid yin // zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: are uncertain reasons.

original: sngar bstan pa'i rjes su 'gro ba @238a * //üîΩla sogs pa de dag la re zhig so sor tshor ba bde ba'i ngo bo'i rjes su 'gro ba ni tshor ba bde ba bzhin zhes smras pa de la ci rjes su 'gro ba 'di tshor ba bde ba bzhin du bde ba'i ngo bo zhig tu 'gyur ram
analyzed: sngar bstan pa'i rjes su 'gro ba @238a * // la sogs pa de dag la re zhig so sor tshor ba bde ba'i ngo bo'i rjes su 'gro ba ni tshor ba bde ba bzhin zhes smras pa de la ci rjes su 'gro ba 'di tshor ba bde ba bzhin du bde ba'i ngo bo zhig tu 'gyur ram
translated: As previously explained, the reasons of conformity, etc.,üîΩare uncertain reasons.üîΩFor example, it is said that the conformity with the essence of pleasure is like the feeling of pleasure.üîΩBut in that case, is this conformity like the feeling of pleasure, such that it has the essence of pleasure?

original: / 'on te 'dir rjes su 'gro ba 'di tshor ba sdug bsngal bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi ngo bo zhig tu 'gyur ba yin zhes the tshom skye ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: / 'on te 'dir rjes su 'gro ba 'di tshor ba sdug bsngal bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi ngo bo zhig tu 'gyur ba yin zhes the tshom skye ba nyid yin te /
translated: Or is this conformity like the feeling of pain, such that it has the essence of pain?

original: sdug bsngal gyi ngo bo nyid du sgrub pa na ni tshor ba bde ba nyid kyis ma nges pa nyid yin la kun la yang sgrub par byed pa na /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi ngo bo nyid du sgrub pa na ni tshor ba bde ba nyid kyis ma nges pa nyid yin la kun la yang sgrub par byed pa na /
translated: If you establish that feeling is by nature suffering, then it is not established that there is pleasure.

original: bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / gti mug gi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo'i rjes su 'gro bas dpe ji lta bu zhig yod /
analyzed: bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / gti mug gi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo'i rjes su 'gro bas dpe ji lta bu zhig yod /
translated: If you establish that feeling is by nature suffering in all cases, then what is the example of the feeling that is the nature of pleasure, pain, or confusion?

original: phyogs gnyi ga la grags pa'i rigs mthun pa'i dngos po'i don gyi ngo bo med pas de la 'jug pa yang ma yin la /
analyzed: phyogs gnyi ga la grags pa'i rigs mthun pa'i dngos po'i don gyi ngo bo med pas de la 'jug pa yang ma yin la /
translated: Since the nature of the object that is the same kind of thing that is renowned to both parties does not exist, it is not engaged.

original: gtan tshigs thams cad kyang thun mong ma yin pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs thams cad kyang thun mong ma yin pa nyid yin no //
translated: And all reasons are not shared.

original: bya ba dang byed pa gzhan ma yin pa nyid yin no zhes zer ba de la yang gal te gang byed pa po yin pa de las bya ba gzhan ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: bya ba dang byed pa gzhan ma yin pa nyid yin no zhes zer ba de la yang gal te gang byed pa po yin pa de las bya ba gzhan ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the action and the agent are not different, then if the agent is not different from the action,

original: grub pa sgrub pa yin te /
analyzed: grub pa sgrub pa yin te /
translated: you are proving what is already established.

original: de yang 'di ltar zho ni srub ma la sogs pa'i rkyen rnams kyi ni byed pa po'i ngo bo yin la /
analyzed: de yang 'di ltar zho ni srub ma la sogs pa'i rkyen rnams kyi ni byed pa po'i ngo bo yin la /
translated: In this regard, the churning stick and so on are the nature of the agent of curd,

original: 'o ma'i ni bya ba ma yin yang /
analyzed: 'o ma'i ni bya ba ma yin yang /
translated: but they are not the action of curd.

original: rang gi ngo bo gzhan ma yin pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo gzhan ma yin pa nyid yin no //
translated: It is not different from its own nature.

original: ci ste rang gi byed pa ma spangs pa'i rang gi ngo bo yin pas bya ba gzhan ma yin pa nyid yin na ni dpe yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ci ste rang gi byed pa ma spangs pa'i rang gi ngo bo yin pas bya ba gzhan ma yin pa nyid yin na ni dpe yod pa ma yin te /
translated: But if it is not different from its own nature, which is not abandoned, then the example does not exist,

original: 'o ma ni rang gi byed pa po'i dngos po las gzhan ma yin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'o ma ni rang gi byed pa po'i dngos po las gzhan ma yin pa ma yin no //
translated: because milk is not not different from its own nature as an agent.

original: dus dbyer med pas gzhan min na'ang //
analyzed: dus dbyer med pas gzhan min na'ang //
translated: If it is not different because of nondifference in time,

original: grags dang lung dang 'gal ba nyid //
analyzed: grags dang lung dang 'gal ba nyid //
translated: then it contradicts what is well known and scripture.

original: byed pa po dang bya ba ni gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: byed pa po dang bya ba ni gzhan ma yin te /
translated: An agent and action are not different,

original: dus nye bar gnas pa'i phyir byed pa po dang dus mnyam pa nyid du bya ba 'byung ba nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dus nye bar gnas pa'i phyir byed pa po dang dus mnyam pa nyid du bya ba 'byung ba nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: because the action occurs at the same time as the agent, since the time is present.

original: 'dir re zhig 'jig rten gyi grags pa dang 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: 'dir re zhig 'jig rten gyi grags pa dang 'gal ba yin te /
translated: Here, first, it contradicts what is well known in the world,

original: 'jig rten pa la ni sa bon gyi dus kyang gzhan yin la /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa la ni sa bon gyi dus kyang gzhan yin la /
translated: because for worldly people the time of the seed is different,

original: myu gu'i dus kyang gzhan yin zhing /
analyzed: myu gu'i dus kyang gzhan yin zhing /
translated: and the time of the sprout is different.

original: de bzhin du mngal na gnas pa'i dus kyang gzhan yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin du mngal na gnas pa'i dus kyang gzhan yin la /
translated: Similarly, the time of the embryo is different,üîΩand the time of the child is different.

original: skye ba'i dus kyang gzhan yin no zhes bya ba nyid du grags pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: skye ba'i dus kyang gzhan yin no zhes bya ba nyid du grags pa nyid yin no //
translated: And the time of its arising is also different.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Objection:

original: tsandan mi mngon pas med par gyur pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tsandan mi mngon pas med par gyur pa ma yin te /
translated: The sandalwood is not nonexistent because it is not manifest.

original: tsandan gyi ngo bo zhes drug pa'i dbye ba bstan pa yod la /
analyzed: tsandan gyi ngo bo zhes drug pa'i dbye ba bstan pa yod la /
translated: The statement ‚Äúthe nature of the sandalwood‚Äù teaches the sixth case.

original: 'das pa la sogs pa'i dus ston par byed pa yin na yang /
analyzed: 'das pa la sogs pa'i dus ston par byed pa yin na yang /
translated: And although it teaches the past and so on,

original: @238b da ltar gyi skad cig ma la sogs pa bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: @238b da ltar gyi skad cig ma la sogs pa bzhin no zhe na /
translated: it is like the present moment and so on.

original: 'di la yang brjod par bya ste /üîΩtsandan ngo bo mi mngon pas //
analyzed: 'di la yang brjod par bya ste / tsandan ngo bo mi mngon pas //
translated: Here we say:üîΩThe sandalwood is not established as nonexistent

original: med par sgrub pa ma yin te //
analyzed: med par sgrub pa ma yin te //
translated: because it is not manifest,

original: dus dang drug pas bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: dus dang drug pas bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: because it is taught by the sixth case

original: da ltar skad cig bzhin zhe na //
analyzed: da ltar skad cig bzhin zhe na //
translated: and by the word ‚Äútime,‚Äù just like the present moment.üîΩEven though this is so,

original: de lta na yang spro gyur nas //
analyzed: de lta na yang spro gyur nas //
translated: you are still pleased

original: rang gi lugs kyi skyon sred kyang //
analyzed: rang gi lugs kyi skyon sred kyang //
translated: and you still assert the faults of our system,

original: smra ba'i skyon rnams med min te //
analyzed: smra ba'i skyon rnams med min te //
translated: but the faults of your statement are not absent.

original: gyen du skra 'greng bum 'dra bzhin //
analyzed: gyen du skra 'greng bum 'dra bzhin //
translated: They are like the pot that is like the hair standing up on end.üîΩThis is well known:

original: 'di ltar grags te dbang pos ka rna la //
analyzed: 'di ltar grags te dbang pos ka rna la //
translated: The king of KƒÅ·πá·πái

original: dgra bo gsod par byed pa'i mtshon cha 'phang mdung byin pa dang / des de srid sgrub gsong pa'i phyir sbas nas bzung ngo //
analyzed: dgra bo gsod par byed pa'i mtshon cha 'phang mdung byin pa dang / des de srid sgrub gsong pa'i phyir sbas nas bzung ngo //
translated: He gave him a spear as a weapon to kill his enemy, and he hid it in order to accomplish that.

original: yang ka rnas 'jigs byed sde'i bu nags kyi srin mo las skyes pa skra gyen du 'greng ba bum pa lta bu zhes bya ba dang / lan gsum gyi bar du 'thabs pa na ji srid du des ka rna pham par byas pa las ka rnas 'phang ma dung de skra gyen du 'greng ba bum pa lta bu de gsad pa'i phyir 'phangs pa dang /üîΩskra gyen du 'greng ba bum pa lta bu sbrul gyi gzugs su bsgyur nas gnas pa na 'phang mdung de yang nam mkha' lding gi gzugs su bsgyur nas gnas so //
analyzed: yang ka rnas 'jigs byed sde'i bu nags kyi srin mo las skyes pa skra gyen du 'greng ba bum pa lta bu zhes bya ba dang / lan gsum gyi bar du 'thabs pa na ji srid du des ka rna pham par byas pa las ka rnas 'phang ma dung de skra gyen du 'greng ba bum pa lta bu de gsad pa'i phyir 'phangs pa dang / skra gyen du 'greng ba bum pa lta bu sbrul gyi gzugs su bsgyur nas gnas pa na 'phang mdung de yang nam mkha' lding gi gzugs su bsgyur nas gnas so //
translated: Then Kar·πáa‚Äôs son, born from a demoness of the forest, named Ja·π≠hara, who had hair standing up like a pot, fought with him three times. As long as he defeated Kar·πáa, Kar·πáa threw that spear, which was like a conch shell, in order to kill him.üîΩJa·π≠hara, who had hair standing up like a pot, transformed into the form of a snake and remained there. That spear also transformed into the form of a garu·∏ça and remained there.

original: yang skra gyen du 'greng ba bum pa lta bu byi la'i gzugs su bsgyur nas gnas pa na /
analyzed: yang skra gyen du 'greng ba bum pa lta bu byi la'i gzugs su bsgyur nas gnas pa na /
translated: Again, Ja·π≠hara, who had hair standing up like a pot, transformed into the form of a cat and remained there.

original: 'phang ma dung de 'gu pa'i gzugs su gyur nas nye bar gnas so //
analyzed: 'phang ma dung de 'gu pa'i gzugs su gyur nas nye bar gnas so //
translated: The spear transformed into the form of a woman and stood before him.

original: skra gyen du 'greng ba phum pa lta bu med bsgyur ba na 'phang mdung yang chu'i bdag nyid du gyur nas rjes su 'brang ste /
analyzed: skra gyen du 'greng ba phum pa lta bu med bsgyur ba na 'phang mdung yang chu'i bdag nyid du gyur nas rjes su 'brang ste /
translated: When he transformed his hair into a vase, the spear also transformed into the nature of water and followed him.

original: de bzhin du des gang dang gang gi gzugs su bsgyur nas nye bar gnas pa na /
analyzed: de bzhin du des gang dang gang gi gzugs su bsgyur nas nye bar gnas pa na /
translated: In the same way, whatever form he transformed into and stood before her,

original: 'phang ma dung de yang de'i gnyen po gang yin pa de dang de'i gzugs su bsgyur nas rjes su 'brel te /üîΩchung ma'i gzugs su gyur nas des skra gyen du 'greng ba bum pa lta bu bsad par gyur pa'i bar du 'byung ba bzhin du de bzhin du khyod kyang rnam grangs gzhan dang gzhan nye bar bzung nas nye bar gnas pa na de dag la yang /
analyzed: 'phang ma dung de yang de'i gnyen po gang yin pa de dang de'i gzugs su bsgyur nas rjes su 'brel te / chung ma'i gzugs su gyur nas des skra gyen du 'greng ba bum pa lta bu bsad par gyur pa'i bar du 'byung ba bzhin du de bzhin du khyod kyang rnam grangs gzhan dang gzhan nye bar bzung nas nye bar gnas pa na de dag la yang /
translated: the spear also transformed into the form of whatever was its antidote and followed her.üîΩWhen he transformed into the form of a wife, she killed him by transforming his hair into a vase.

original: sngar smras pa'i skyon dag bzlog par dka' ba yin gyi med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sngar smras pa'i skyon dag bzlog par dka' ba yin gyi med pa ma yin te /
translated: In the same way, you also stand before them by taking up other and other synonyms, and it is not the case that the previously mentioned faults are not difficult to overcome.

original: 'di ltar / skra gyen du 'greng ba bum pa lta bu la 'phang mdung rjes su 'brel bar 'byung ba bzhin du ji srid khyod gzhan rnam par mnan pa'i phyir spro ba yod pa de srid du /
analyzed: 'di ltar / skra gyen du 'greng ba bum pa lta bu la 'phang mdung rjes su 'brel bar 'byung ba bzhin du ji srid khyod gzhan rnam par mnan pa'i phyir spro ba yod pa de srid du /
translated: just as a spear is connected to a shield, so long as you are enthusiastic to suppress others,

original: yang skyon de dang bcas pa yin te /
analyzed: yang skyon de dang bcas pa yin te /
translated: you will still have the same faults.

original: skyon ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: skyon ci zhig ce na /
translated: What are the faults?

original: gal te nus pa'i ngo bor de yod pa nyid yin na ni dpe med pa yin la /üîΩgsal @239a * //
analyzed: gal te nus pa'i ngo bor de yod pa nyid yin na ni dpe med pa yin la / gsal @239a * //
translated: If it exists in the nature of potential, it is without example.

original: ba'i ngo bor yod pa nyid yin na ni grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa yod do //
analyzed: ba'i ngo bor yod pa nyid yin na ni grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa yod do //
translated: If it exists in the nature of clarity, it contradicts your tenets.

original: nye bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi don yang 'dir ci zhig yin /
analyzed: nye bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi don yang 'dir ci zhig yin /
translated: What is the meaning of the reason ‚Äúbecause it exists‚Äù?

original: ci de'i gzugs nyid du nye bar gnas pa zhig yin nam /
analyzed: ci de'i gzugs nyid du nye bar gnas pa zhig yin nam /
translated: Does it exist in the form of that?

original: 'on te 'dir de dang tha mi dad pa'i gzugs gcig yin /
analyzed: 'on te 'dir de dang tha mi dad pa'i gzugs gcig yin /
translated: Or is it a form that is not different from that?

original: des cir 'gyur /
analyzed: des cir 'gyur /
translated: What is the point?

original: des gzugs she na gtan tshigs don //
analyzed: des gzugs she na gtan tshigs don //
translated: If it is form, the reason is meaningless.

original: rnam par rtog pa ma nges nyid //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa ma nges nyid //
translated: It is just an indeterminate conception.

original: dbyer med ngo bo yin na yang //
analyzed: dbyer med ngo bo yin na yang //
translated: If it is an inseparable entity,

original: gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid yin //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid yin //
translated: The reason is inconclusive.

original: de'i gzugs zhes bya ba ci nags tshal gyi rang gi ngo bo bzhin du gcig par gyur ba zhig yin nam /
analyzed: de'i gzugs zhes bya ba ci nags tshal gyi rang gi ngo bo bzhin du gcig par gyur ba zhig yin nam /
translated: What is called its form is it one, like the nature of a forest?

original: 'on te dum bu bzhin du gzhan nyid du gyur pa zhig yin zhes bya ba ni ma nges pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'on te dum bu bzhin du gzhan nyid du gyur pa zhig yin zhes bya ba ni ma nges pa nyid yin no //
translated: Or is it different, like the parts of a forest? This is inconclusive.

original: tha mi dad pa zhig yin na yang gang zhig gang dang 'dra bar gyur ba yin /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa zhig yin na yang gang zhig gang dang 'dra bar gyur ba yin /
translated: If it is not different, what is similar to what?

original: mi de nyid dang mi de nyid 'dra'o zhes bya bar mi rung ba ste /
analyzed: mi de nyid dang mi de nyid 'dra'o zhes bya bar mi rung ba ste /
translated: It is not possible to say that a man is similar to that very man.

original: bdag dang gzhan la gtan tshigs ma grub pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan la gtan tshigs ma grub pa nyid yin no //
translated: The reason is not established for the opponent or for us.üîΩMoreover,

original: gzhan yang ; rna sogs spyad bya ma yin te //
analyzed: gzhan yang ; rna sogs spyad bya ma yin te //
translated: The ear, etc. are not objects of experience.üîΩIf you accept that,

original: rtogs pa med phyir gal te 'dod //
analyzed: rtogs pa med phyir gal te 'dod //
translated: because they are not cognized,üîΩthen it is established that they are objects of experience,

original: khyad par dag ni ma bstan par //üîΩspyad bya'o zhe na grub pa sgrub //
analyzed: khyad par dag ni ma bstan par // spyad bya'o zhe na grub pa sgrub //
translated: if you do not teach any distinctions.

original: gal te pha rol po na re rna ba la sogs pa 'di dag ni rtogs pa med pa'i phyir spyad par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: gal te pha rol po na re rna ba la sogs pa 'di dag ni rtogs pa med pa'i phyir spyad par bya ba yin la /
translated: If the opponent says, these ears, etc. are objects of experience because they are not cognized,üîΩand

original: gang rtogs pa dang bcas pa de ni spyod pa po yin no zhe na /üîΩgal te rtag pa thams cad du khyab pa la sogs pa'i khyad par khas len par mi byed par spyod pa po bcas pa nyid du sgrub na ni grub pa sgrub pa yin te /
analyzed: gang rtogs pa dang bcas pa de ni spyod pa po yin no zhe na / gal te rtag pa thams cad du khyab pa la sogs pa'i khyad par khas len par mi byed par spyod pa po bcas pa nyid du sgrub na ni grub pa sgrub pa yin te /
translated: If you say that the one who is aware is the one who acts,üîΩif you are proving that the one who acts is the one who is aware, then you are proving what is already established, because we also assert that the mind that arises from the assembly of the ear and so on is the one who acts.üîΩBut if you are proving that the one who acts is the one who is aware, then your proof is inconclusive, because the ear and so on are not the one who acts.üîΩIf you say that the one who acts is the one who is aware,

original: bdag kyang de bzhin du rna ba la sogs pa'i dbang po dang yul tshogs pa las rab tu byung ba'i sems spyod pa po nyid du mngon par 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag kyang de bzhin du rna ba la sogs pa'i dbang po dang yul tshogs pa las rab tu byung ba'i sems spyod pa po nyid du mngon par 'dod pa yin no //
translated: then the one who acts would not be the one who is aware,

original: ci ste g-yo ba med sogs kyi //
analyzed: ci ste g-yo ba med sogs kyi //
translated: because the one who acts is not the one who is aware.

original: khyad par can na rjes 'gro gang //
analyzed: khyad par can na rjes 'gro gang //
translated: If you say that the one who is aware is the one who acts,üîΩthen the one who is aware would not be the one who acts,

original: rtogs par bden yang rtsol med phyir //
analyzed: rtogs par bden yang rtsol med phyir //
translated: because the one who is aware is not the one who acts.üîΩIf you say that the one who is aware is the one who acts,

original: byed pa por ni mi 'dod do //üîΩkun la khyab pa rtag pa btang snyoms su gnas pa'i spyod pa po'i skyes bu ni yod de /
analyzed: byed pa por ni mi 'dod do // kun la khyab pa rtag pa btang snyoms su gnas pa'i spyod pa po'i skyes bu ni yod de /
translated: then the one who is aware would not be the one who acts,üîΩbecause the one who is aware is not the one who acts.üîΩIf you say that the one who is aware is the one who acts,üîΩthen the one who is aware would not be the one who acts,üîΩbecause the one who is aware is not the one who acts.üîΩIf you say that the one who is aware is the one who acts,üîΩthen the one who is aware would not be the one who acts,üîΩbecause the one who is aware is not the one who acts.üîΩIf you say that the one who is aware is the one who acts,üîΩthen the one who is aware would not be the one who acts,üîΩbecause the one who is aware is not the one who acts.üîΩIf you say that the one who is aware is the one who acts,üîΩthen the one who is aware would not be the one who acts,üîΩbecause the one who is aware is not the one who acts.üîΩIf you say that the one who is aware is the one who acts,üîΩthen the one who is aware would not be the one who acts,üîΩbecause the one who is aware is not the one who acts.üîΩIf you say that the one who is aware is the one who acts,üîΩthen the one who is aware would not be the one who acts,

original: spyod pa po yin pa'i phyir ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: spyod pa po yin pa'i phyir ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: because the one who is aware is not the one who acts.üîΩIf you say that

original: rigs mthun pa'i dngos po'i don gzhan med par rjes su 'gro ba ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: rigs mthun pa'i dngos po'i don gzhan med par rjes su 'gro ba ma grub pa yin no //
translated: But it is not established that it is not a different object of the same type.

original: gzhan yang rtogs pa yin pa bden du zin kyang spyod pa po nyid yin par mi rigs te /
analyzed: gzhan yang rtogs pa yin pa bden du zin kyang spyod pa po nyid yin par mi rigs te /
translated: Moreover, even if it is true that it is the cognizer, it is not reasonable that it is the experiencer.

original: bya ba la 'jug pa med pa'i phyir yan lag thams cad bcings pa'i skyes bu bzhin nam /
analyzed: bya ba la 'jug pa med pa'i phyir yan lag thams cad bcings pa'i skyes bu bzhin nam /
translated: Because it does not engage in action, it is like a person whose limbs are bound,

original: @239b gnyid log pa'am myos pa bzhin no //
analyzed: @239b gnyid log pa'am myos pa bzhin no //
translated: or like one who is asleep or intoxicated.

original: gal te yang 'dir bdag cag ni rdul ni spyod par byed pa'i bdag nyid yin par 'dod la /
analyzed: gal te yang 'dir bdag cag ni rdul ni spyod par byed pa'i bdag nyid yin par 'dod la /
translated: Moreover, if you assert that the self is the experiencer of the atoms,

original: de lhag par 'jug par gyur pa na /
analyzed: de lhag par 'jug par gyur pa na /
translated: then when it engages in them,

original: dngos po thams cad bya ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad bya ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
translated: all things would be engaged.

original: des na de nye bar gnas pa tsam gyis phan btags pas skyes bu yang bya ba dang bcas pa nyid du nye bar spyod pa yin no zhe na /üîΩsmras pa / dngos rnams bya ba med nyid du //
analyzed: des na de nye bar gnas pa tsam gyis phan btags pas skyes bu yang bya ba dang bcas pa nyid du nye bar spyod pa yin no zhe na / smras pa / dngos rnams bya ba med nyid du //
translated: Therefore, since the mere presence of the self benefits them, the person also would be engaged.üîΩIn response NƒÅgƒÅrjuna explains:

original: rab tu rtogs te gzhal bya'i phyir //
analyzed: rab tu rtogs te gzhal bya'i phyir //
translated: Things are fully understood to be devoid of activity.

original: smras pa ci ltar de de ltar //
analyzed: smras pa ci ltar de de ltar //
translated: In response to that it is said: How is it that it is like that?

original: rtogs te bde dang gti mug bzhin //
analyzed: rtogs te bde dang gti mug bzhin //
translated: Just like pleasure and confusion.

original: dngos po nyid ni bya ba dang bral ba yin te /
analyzed: dngos po nyid ni bya ba dang bral ba yin te /
translated: An entity is devoid of activity,

original: gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is an object of knowledge.

original: gang dang gang gzhal bya yin pa de ni bya ba med pa yin te /
analyzed: gang dang gang gzhal bya yin pa de ni bya ba med pa yin te /
translated: Whatever is an object of knowledge is devoid of activity,

original: dper na bde ba dang / gti mug bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na bde ba dang / gti mug bzhin no //
translated: just like pleasure and confusion.

original: gal te sdug bsngal zhes bya ba yang rdul gyis yin pas ma nges pa nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te sdug bsngal zhes bya ba yang rdul gyis yin pas ma nges pa nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the example is not established, because pain is also an aggregation of atoms, then that is not so.

original: bya ba med par sdug bsngal yang //üîΩshes par bya ste rgyud ldan phyir //
analyzed: bya ba med par sdug bsngal yang // shes par bya ste rgyud ldan phyir //
translated: Pain is also to be known as devoid of activity,üîΩbecause it is a continuum, because it is not a cognition,

original: rtogs pa med phyir brjod bya'i phyir //
analyzed: rtogs pa med phyir brjod bya'i phyir //
translated: because it is an object of expression,

original: gzhal bya yin phyir gti mug bzhin //
analyzed: gzhal bya yin phyir gti mug bzhin //
translated: and because it is an object of knowledge, just like confusion.

original: rdul gyi rang bzhin gyi sdug bsngal ni 'dir chos can no //
analyzed: rdul gyi rang bzhin gyi sdug bsngal ni 'dir chos can no //
translated: Pain that has the nature of atoms is the subject here.

original: bya ba dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni de'i chos te bsgrub par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bya ba dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni de'i chos te bsgrub par bya ba'o //
translated: Being devoid of activity is its property, which is to be proven.

original: gang dang gang rgyud dang ldan pa dang rtogs pa med pa dang / brjod bya yin pa dang / gzhal bya yin pa de ni bya ba med pa yin te /
analyzed: gang dang gang rgyud dang ldan pa dang rtogs pa med pa dang / brjod bya yin pa dang / gzhal bya yin pa de ni bya ba med pa yin te /
translated: Whatever is a continuum, whatever is not a cognition, whatever is an object of expression, and whatever is an object of knowledge is devoid of activity,üîΩjust like confusion.

original: dper na gti mug bzhin no zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya'i rjes su 'gro ba yin no //
analyzed: dper na gti mug bzhin no zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya'i rjes su 'gro ba yin no //
translated: This is the forward pervasion.

original: gal te yang 'dir gang khyod kyis sngar 'di skad du rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs rnams kyis gtso bo la sogs pa'i yon tan ma nges pa bzhin no zhes pa de mi rigs te /
analyzed: gal te yang 'dir gang khyod kyis sngar 'di skad du rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs rnams kyis gtso bo la sogs pa'i yon tan ma nges pa bzhin no zhes pa de mi rigs te /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúIn this case, it is not correct to say that, like the qualities of the primary nature and so on, the qualities of the self are not ascertained by reasons such as forward pervasion and so on,‚Äù

original: rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs rnams kyis tha dad pa nyid du khyad par can du brjod pa yin pa'i phyir gtso bo'i yon tan rnams kyang tha mi dad pa nyid du gyur pa med par gtso bo la gnas pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs rnams kyis tha dad pa nyid du khyad par can du brjod pa yin pa'i phyir gtso bo'i yon tan rnams kyang tha mi dad pa nyid du gyur pa med par gtso bo la gnas pa yin no zhe na /
translated: because the reasons of forward pervasion and so on are stated as the qualifier of difference, the qualities of the primary nature also do not exist without difference, abiding in the primary nature.üîΩIn response, Aryadeva says:üîΩBecause you assert

original: 'di la / rjes 'gro la sogs gtan tshigs rnams //
analyzed: 'di la / rjes 'gro la sogs gtan tshigs rnams //
translated: that the reasons of forward pervasion and so on

original: tha dad nyid du 'dod pas na //üîΩgtso bo'i yon tan la de rnams //
analyzed: tha dad nyid du 'dod pas na // gtso bo'i yon tan la de rnams //
translated: are different,

original: ma nges ma yin pa de bden //
analyzed: ma nges ma yin pa de bden //
translated: it is not the case that the qualities of the primary nature are not ascertained.

original: 'on kyang skyon chen po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'on kyang skyon chen po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: That is true, but this great fault arises.

original: bya dang byed pa sgrub bcas phyir //
analyzed: bya dang byed pa sgrub bcas phyir //
translated: Because the action, the agent, and the accomplishment exist,

original: rgyu dang ldan par rjes dpag nyid //
analyzed: rgyu dang ldan par rjes dpag nyid //
translated: and the existence of the cause is inferred.

original: gtan tshigs rnams kyang khyad bcas @240a * //
analyzed: gtan tshigs rnams kyang khyad bcas @240a * //
translated: The reasons are qualified,

original: pas ; / de ltar 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: pas ; / de ltar 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur //
translated: and thus there is contradiction.

original: gtso bo ni yod de /
analyzed: gtso bo ni yod de /
translated: The primal substance exists,

original: rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is a division of it into the categories of ‚Äúuniversal‚Äù and so on.

original: gang la dbye ba med pa de la rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa med de de yod pa nyid du bsgrubs pa na gtso bo med pa nyid do zhes bsgrub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang la dbye ba med pa de la rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa med de de yod pa nyid du bsgrubs pa na gtso bo med pa nyid do zhes bsgrub par 'gyur te /
translated: That which has no division has no universal and so on. If you prove that it exists, you prove that the primal substance does not exist,

original: de la dbye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la dbye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has no division.

original: ci ste yang gtso bo la yang dbye ba yod pas rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste yang gtso bo la yang dbye ba yod pas rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the primal substance has division, and therefore has a universal and so on,üîΩthen, just as the division exists as manifest, as an agent, as an action, and as having a cause, in the same way the primal substance would also be manifest, an agent,

original: de lta na yang ji ltar dbye ba gsal ba nyid du yod pa dang / byed pa po yin pa dang bya ba yin pa dang / rgyu dang ldan pa yin pa ltar de bzhin du gtso bo yang gsal ba nyid dang / byed pa po nyid dang /
analyzed: de lta na yang ji ltar dbye ba gsal ba nyid du yod pa dang / byed pa po yin pa dang bya ba yin pa dang / rgyu dang ldan pa yin pa ltar de bzhin du gtso bo yang gsal ba nyid dang / byed pa po nyid dang /
translated: an action, and having a cause.

original: bya ba nyid dang / rgyu dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur la des na chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo las bzlog pa bsgrub pa'i phyir 'gal ba'i don nyid yin no //
analyzed: bya ba nyid dang / rgyu dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur la des na chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo las bzlog pa bsgrub pa'i phyir 'gal ba'i don nyid yin no //
translated: It would be an action and it would possess a cause, and thus it would be contradictory because it would be established as the opposite of the nature of the subject.

original: gang tsandan gyi mi mngon par gyur bas med par gyur pa ni ma yin no zhes smras pa de yang 'di ltar tsandan las dum bu la sogs pa gzhan yang ma yin la /
analyzed: gang tsandan gyi mi mngon par gyur bas med par gyur pa ni ma yin no zhes smras pa de yang 'di ltar tsandan las dum bu la sogs pa gzhan yang ma yin la /
translated: You say that the sandalwood is not nonexistent because it is not manifest, but it is not the case that the pieces of the sandalwood and so on are different.

original: tsandan de nyid 'di yin no zhes kyang brjod par mi nus te /
analyzed: tsandan de nyid 'di yin no zhes kyang brjod par mi nus te /
translated: You cannot say that the sandalwood itself is this.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: de ma bzung bar mi 'dzin pas //
analyzed: de ma bzung bar mi 'dzin pas //
translated: Since it is not apprehended without that,

original: gzugs sogs gzhan min de dngos bzhin //
analyzed: gzugs sogs gzhan min de dngos bzhin //
translated: form and so on are not different from it, just as it is.

original: tha dad dngos phyir gzhan min min //
analyzed: tha dad dngos phyir gzhan min min //
translated: Since it is a different entity, it is not not different.

original: gang de rtogs bya rtogs byed phyir //
analyzed: gang de rtogs bya rtogs byed phyir //
translated: Since it is the object to be realized and the realizer,

original: gang dum bu la sogs pa la gzugs la sogs pa yod pa ni tsandan la ma ltos par ma yin pa'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa de rnams ma bzung ba nyid kyi dum bu la sogs pa bzung ba ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang dum bu la sogs pa la gzugs la sogs pa yod pa ni tsandan la ma ltos par ma yin pa'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa de rnams ma bzung ba nyid kyi dum bu la sogs pa bzung ba ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: But the parts, etc., do not exist without depending on form, etc., and therefore, since form, etc., are not apprehended, the parts, etc., are not apprehended.

original: tsandan gyi sdong po'i rang gi ngo bo bzhin no //
analyzed: tsandan gyi sdong po'i rang gi ngo bo bzhin no //
translated: It is like the essence of the sandalwood.

original: mi mngon par gyur pa'i tsandan las tsandan gzhan ma yin pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: mi mngon par gyur pa'i tsandan las tsandan gzhan ma yin pa yang ma yin te /
translated: But the sandalwood is not different from the invisible parts.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: gang tsandan ni gcig yin la dum bu ni mang po nyid du 'di ltar bgrang ba bzhin du rtogs par bya ba la ni rnam pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin la /
analyzed: gang tsandan ni gcig yin la dum bu ni mang po nyid du 'di ltar bgrang ba bzhin du rtogs par bya ba la ni rnam pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin la /
translated: The sandalwood is one, and the parts are many, and the parts are to be understood in this way, as counted.

original: rtogs pa po ni gcig yin te /
analyzed: rtogs pa po ni gcig yin te /
translated: The one who understands is one.

original: des na de dag gzhan ma yin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na de dag gzhan ma yin pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, they are not different.

original: des na mi mngon ma yin la //
analyzed: des na mi mngon ma yin la //
translated: Therefore, it is not invisible.

original: bya ba yod pa'ang mi 'dod do ;
analyzed: bya ba yod pa'ang mi 'dod do ;
translated: Nor is the existence of action accepted.

original: / gang gi phyir dum bu skyed par byed pa ma yin pa des na mi mngon pa yang ma yin la /
analyzed: / gang gi phyir dum bu skyed par byed pa ma yin pa des na mi mngon pa yang ma yin la /
translated: Since the parts are not producers, therefore it is not invisible.

original: gang gi phyir tsandan gyi sdong po'i rang gi ngo bo dang bral ba des na byed pa nyid yin gyi bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir tsandan gyi sdong po'i rang gi ngo bo dang bral ba des na byed pa nyid yin gyi bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Because it is devoid of the nature of a sandalwood tree, therefore it is an agent, but not an action.

original: dpe med pa'i phyir na yang /üîΩda ltar gyi ni skad cig kyang //
analyzed: dpe med pa'i phyir na yang / da ltar gyi ni skad cig kyang //
translated: Also, because of the absence of an example:üîΩThe present is not renowned

original: rdzas su yod par ma grags nyid //
analyzed: rdzas su yod par ma grags nyid //
translated: As substantially existent even in a moment.

original: ces @240b bya ba smras te /
analyzed: ces @240b bya ba smras te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: da ltar gyi skad cig rdzas su yod par 'ga' zhig gis 'dod du zin kyang dbu mar smra ba rnams la ni de rdzas su yod par ma grags te /
analyzed: da ltar gyi skad cig rdzas su yod par 'ga' zhig gis 'dod du zin kyang dbu mar smra ba rnams la ni de rdzas su yod par ma grags te /
translated: Even if someone maintained that the present moment is substantially existent, for the proponents of the Middle Way, it is not renowned as substantially existent.

original: gang gi phyir skad cig de nyid kyi thog ma'i dus kyang gzhan /
analyzed: gang gi phyir skad cig de nyid kyi thog ma'i dus kyang gzhan /
translated: Because the beginning of that moment is one thing,

original: bar gyi dus kyang gzhan /
analyzed: bar gyi dus kyang gzhan /
translated: the middle of that moment is another,

original: tha ma'i dus kyang gzhan nyid yin no //
analyzed: tha ma'i dus kyang gzhan nyid yin no //
translated: and the end of that moment is yet another.

original: des na 'dus pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir rdzas su med pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: des na 'dus pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir rdzas su med pa nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore, because it is the nature of a composite, it does not exist substantially.

original: gal te 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: gal te 'dir smras pa /
translated: If someone says this,

original: spyod dang bcas pa'i spyad bya 'di //
analyzed: spyod dang bcas pa'i spyad bya 'di //
translated: The present is not substantially existent,

original: spyad bya yin phyir ma la sogs bzhin //
analyzed: spyad bya yin phyir ma la sogs bzhin //
translated: Because it is an object of engagement, like a mother, and so on.

original: rtogs pa po ni spyod pa nyid //
analyzed: rtogs pa po ni spyod pa nyid //
translated: The one who comprehends is the very engagement.

original: ces de ltar gzhan gyis smras pa la rab tu byed pa bzhi chas lan smras pa /
analyzed: ces de ltar gzhan gyis smras pa la rab tu byed pa bzhi chas lan smras pa /
translated: Thus, the four chapters have responded to the opponent‚Äôs statements.

original: de yi sgrub par byed pa min //üîΩzhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de yi sgrub par byed pa min // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚Äú It does not establish that.üîΩ‚Äù

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: What does this mean?

original: 'dus pa'i bdag nyid kyi spyod pa po ni mal cha dang stan la sogs pa la ltos pa bzhin du rtogs pa yang 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid du grub pas chos can gyi khyad par las bzlog pa sgrub pa'i phyir 'gal ba'i don nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'dus pa'i bdag nyid kyi spyod pa po ni mal cha dang stan la sogs pa la ltos pa bzhin du rtogs pa yang 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid du grub pas chos can gyi khyad par las bzlog pa sgrub pa'i phyir 'gal ba'i don nyid yin no //
translated: Just as the experiencer, who is a composite, depends on such things as a bed and a seat, so too, the realization is established as having the nature of a composite. Therefore, the meaning of the word ‚Äúcontradictory‚Äù is that it refutes the specific property of the subject.

original: de nas yang rtogs pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig yin zhes dris pa na /
analyzed: de nas yang rtogs pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig yin zhes dris pa na /
translated: Then, again, the question is asked, ‚ÄúWhat is this so-called realization?‚Äù

original: gal te pha rol po gang shes bya nges par rtogs pa de ni rtogs pa yin no zhes smra na de la 'di skad brjod bar bya ste /
analyzed: gal te pha rol po gang shes bya nges par rtogs pa de ni rtogs pa yin no zhes smra na de la 'di skad brjod bar bya ste /
translated: If the opponent says, ‚ÄúThe ascertainment of the object of knowledge is realization,‚Äù then this should be said to him:

original: rtogs pa nges par rtogs yin na //
analyzed: rtogs pa nges par rtogs yin na //
translated: ‚ÄúIf realization is the ascertainment,

original: de ni gang gi yin pa smros //üîΩdngos po byed pa la brten te //
analyzed: de ni gang gi yin pa smros // dngos po byed pa la brten te //
translated: say whose it is!üîΩIt is like the dyeing of cloth

original: gos sogs tshon du btsos pa bzhin //
analyzed: gos sogs tshon du btsos pa bzhin //
translated: and so on, depending on the action of the thing.

original: rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni blo yin te /
analyzed: rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni blo yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúRealization‚Äù is cognition.

original: 'di ltar dngos po'i rkyen yin la dngos po ni nges par rdzas la brten par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar dngos po'i rkyen yin la dngos po ni nges par rdzas la brten par bya ba yin te /
translated: In this way, it is a condition of an entity, and an entity must definitely be based on a substance.

original: ji ltar tshon du gos btsos pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ji ltar tshon du gos btsos pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like, for example, cloth that is dyed.

original: bsgyur ba ni btsos pa ste /
analyzed: bsgyur ba ni btsos pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúTransformation‚Äù is cooking.

original: 'bras chan la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: 'bras chan la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like, for example, rice gruel.üîΩHere, if the substance of nonrealization is not observed in realization, then tell us what realizes it.

original: 'dir yang rtogs pa la ma rtogs pa'i rdzas ni mi dmigs na 'di gang gis rtogs pa yin pa smros shig / gzhan yang /
analyzed: 'dir yang rtogs pa la ma rtogs pa'i rdzas ni mi dmigs na 'di gang gis rtogs pa yin pa smros shig / gzhan yang /
translated: Moreover:

original: sgra sogs shes par mi 'gyur ba //
analyzed: sgra sogs shes par mi 'gyur ba //
translated: Even if sound and so on are not cognized,

original: yin yang shes pa ji ltar yin //
analyzed: yin yang shes pa ji ltar yin //
translated: how could they be cognized?

original: sgra sogs shes par 'gyur ba nyid //
analyzed: sgra sogs shes par 'gyur ba nyid //
translated: Even if sound and so on are cognized,

original: yin na'ang shes pa ji ltar yin //
analyzed: yin na'ang shes pa ji ltar yin //
translated: how could they be cognized?

original: re zhig gal te blos nges par byas pa'i rjes su byed par yongs su 'gyur ba yang 'di la med pas ji ltar na 'di shes pa por 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: re zhig gal te blos nges par byas pa'i rjes su byed par yongs su 'gyur ba yang 'di la med pas ji ltar na 'di shes pa por 'gyur ba yin /
translated: First, since it does not follow that it is transformed by being ascertained by the mind, how could it be a knower?

original: mi 'gyur ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ri mo la bris pa'am /
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ri mo la bris pa'am /
translated: Because it has the nature of not changing, it is like a drawing.

original: shin du gnyid kyis log pa'i gnas skabs bzhin no //
analyzed: shin du gnyid kyis log pa'i gnas skabs bzhin no //
translated: It is like the state of deep sleep.

original: yang gal te sgra la sogs pa shes par gyur pa 'di 'ga' zhig yongs su 'gyur ba @241a * //
analyzed: yang gal te sgra la sogs pa shes par gyur pa 'di 'ga' zhig yongs su 'gyur ba @241a * //
translated: Moreover, if this consciousness of sound and so on is a transformation of something,

original: 'byung ba yin na ni des na yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'byung ba yin na ni des na yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can yin pa'i phyir /
translated: then because it has the quality of being a transformation,

original: gdong la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhin du rtag pa la sogs pa'i skyon dang ldan par thal bar 'gyur bas rang gi ngo bo nyams pa yin na 'di ji ltar shes pa yin par 'gyur /
analyzed: gdong la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhin du rtag pa la sogs pa'i skyon dang ldan par thal bar 'gyur bas rang gi ngo bo nyams pa yin na 'di ji ltar shes pa yin par 'gyur /
translated: it would follow that it would have the faults of permanence and so on, like a reflection of a face and so on. Therefore, if it is impaired in its own nature, how could it be consciousness?

original: 'di ni byed pa med pa yin na ji ltar na byed pa po nyid du 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di ni byed pa med pa yin na ji ltar na byed pa po nyid du 'gyur /
translated: If it is without activity, how could it be an agent?

original: gal te blos nges par byas pa'i rjes su byed cing rjes su spyod pa'i phyir 'di la byed pa po zhes bya'o zhe na /üîΩbyed pa med pa ma skyes phyir //
analyzed: gal te blos nges par byas pa'i rjes su byed cing rjes su spyod pa'i phyir 'di la byed pa po zhes bya'o zhe na / byed pa med pa ma skyes phyir //
translated: If you say that it is called an agent because it follows and engages in what is ascertained by the mind,üîΩthen how could it be an agent

original: byed bo nyid du ji ltar 'dod //
analyzed: byed bo nyid du ji ltar 'dod //
translated: because it is without activity and unarisen?

original: ma skyes pa la 'dogs na yang //
analyzed: ma skyes pa la 'dogs na yang //
translated: Even if it is imputed to be arisen,

original: skyes bu btags pa pa ru 'gyur //
analyzed: skyes bu btags pa pa ru 'gyur //
translated: it would be an imputed person.

original: nye bar 'dogs par byed na yang byed pa po nyid ma skyes pa'i phyir ri bong gi rva bzhin du rigs ba ma yin te /
analyzed: nye bar 'dogs par byed na yang byed pa po nyid ma skyes pa'i phyir ri bong gi rva bzhin du rigs ba ma yin te /
translated: If it is imputed, then because the agent itself is not arisen, it is not tenable, like the horn of a rabbit,

original: ma skyes ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ma skyes ba'i phyir /
translated: because it is not arisen.

original: 'di'i nye bar gdags pa yang ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di'i nye bar gdags pa yang ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: How could its imputation be established?

original: skyes ba zhig yin na nye bar gdags par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: skyes ba zhig yin na nye bar gdags par 'gyur gyi /
translated: If it were arisen, it would be imputed.

original: ji ltar na shes pa 'di nye bar gdags par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bsams pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar na shes pa 'di nye bar gdags par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bsams pa'o //
translated: But how could this consciousness be imputed?

original: gal te yang me'i sreg pa nye bar gdags pa bzhin du 'dir yang nye bar gdags par bya ste /
analyzed: gal te yang me'i sreg pa nye bar gdags pa bzhin du 'dir yang nye bar gdags par bya ste /
translated: If you think that just as the burning of fire is imputed, so too here the burning of fire is imputed to the thief,

original: ji ltar rkun mos grong bsregs zhes me la yod pa'i sreg pa rkun mo la nye bar 'dogs par byed pa bzhin du blo la yod pa'i shes pa yang skyes bu la nye bar 'dogs par byed do zhes 'dir smar nus te /
analyzed: ji ltar rkun mos grong bsregs zhes me la yod pa'i sreg pa rkun mo la nye bar 'dogs par byed pa bzhin du blo la yod pa'i shes pa yang skyes bu la nye bar 'dogs par byed do zhes 'dir smar nus te /
translated: just as it is said, ‚ÄúThe thief burned the village,‚Äù so too the consciousness that exists in the mind is imputed to the person, you cannot maintain that.

original: skyes bu de bya ba dang bral ba yin na yang byed pa po nyid nye bar 'dogs nye /
analyzed: skyes bu de bya ba dang bral ba yin na yang byed pa po nyid nye bar 'dogs nye /
translated: Even though that person is devoid of action, the state of being an agent is imputed to it.

original: lugs yod pa'i phyir me'i sreg pa nye bar 'dogs pa byed pa bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: lugs yod pa'i phyir me'i sreg pa nye bar 'dogs pa byed pa bzhin no zhe na /
translated: Just as one applies the designation ‚Äúthe burning of fire‚Äù because of the existence of a system.

original: de la yang /
analyzed: de la yang /
translated: To this we reply:

original: byed po'i sgra yi brjod bya'i phyir //
analyzed: byed po'i sgra yi brjod bya'i phyir //
translated: Because of the expression ‚Äúagent,‚Äù

original: me bzhin khyod kyi skyes bu yang //
analyzed: me bzhin khyod kyi skyes bu yang //
translated: your person is like fire.

original: rgyu bcas bya bcas spyad bya dang // bya ba rab tu bskyed pa'ang yin //
analyzed: rgyu bcas bya bcas spyad bya dang // bya ba rab tu bskyed pa'ang yin //
translated: It has a cause, it has an action, it is acted upon, and it generates action.

original: me dang chos 'dra bar byed pa bo zhes tha snyad du 'di la nye bar 'dogs par byed na rgyu dang bcas pa nyid dang / bya ba dang bcas pa nyid dang / spyad par bya ba yin pa nyid dang / bya ba yin pa nyid skyed par byed pa'i chos can yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba me ji lta ba bzhin du 'byung bar yang 'gyur na de lta bur ni khyod mi 'dod do //üîΩgzhan yang / kun khyab ma yin rang bzhin las //
analyzed: me dang chos 'dra bar byed pa bo zhes tha snyad du 'di la nye bar 'dogs par byed na rgyu dang bcas pa nyid dang / bya ba dang bcas pa nyid dang / spyad par bya ba yin pa nyid dang / bya ba yin pa nyid skyed par byed pa'i chos can yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba me ji lta ba bzhin du 'byung bar yang 'gyur na de lta bur ni khyod mi 'dod do // gzhan yang / kun khyab ma yin rang bzhin las //
translated: If you apply the designation ‚Äúagent‚Äù to this person in the same way that fire is designated, then it would follow that it has a cause, it has an action, it is acted upon, and it generates the quality of being an action, just as fire does. But you do not accept that.üîΩMoreover,

original: gzhan pa ma yin skyes bu min //
analyzed: gzhan pa ma yin skyes bu min //
translated: It is not all-pervading, and it is not different from its nature.üîΩIt is not a person.

original: de yi rang dngos khyad par ni //
analyzed: de yi rang dngos khyad par ni //
translated: Its own nature is not distinguished.

original: de yis 'di ltar spong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de yis 'di ltar spong bar 'gyur //
translated: It is refuted in this way.

original: 'dzin kun la khyab pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dzin kun la khyab pa ma yin te /
translated: The grasping of the self is not all-pervasive,

original: phyogs @241b gcig gi spyod yul can yin pa'i phyir me bzhin no //
analyzed: phyogs @241b gcig gi spyod yul can yin pa'i phyir me bzhin no //
translated: because it has a limited scope, like fire.

original: rang bzhin las gzhan pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rang bzhin las gzhan pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it different from the nature of the self,

original: rang bzhin gyi 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir me bzhin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir me bzhin no //
translated: because it is a transformation of the nature of the self, like fire.

original: skyes bu yin par yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: skyes bu yin par yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: Nor is it the person,

original: rtogs pa las gzhan pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir me bzhin no //
analyzed: rtogs pa las gzhan pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir me bzhin no //
translated: because it has a characteristic other than that of being a knower, like fire.

original: de lta bas na khyod rang nyid kyis skyes bu chos can rang gi ngo bo spangs pa dang / chos kyi khyad par spangs pas bsgrubs pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na khyod rang nyid kyis skyes bu chos can rang gi ngo bo spangs pa dang / chos kyi khyad par spangs pas bsgrubs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, you yourself have established that the person, the subject, is devoid of its own nature and devoid of the attributes of the self.

original: des na khas blangs pa de la /üîΩgnod phyir dam bcas skyon med phyir //
analyzed: des na khas blangs pa de la / gnod phyir dam bcas skyon med phyir //
translated: Therefore, in regard to that which you have accepted,üîΩwe say:

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Because it is not undermined, and because there is no fault in our thesis.

original: des na 'dir skyon dang bcas pa yin te /
analyzed: des na 'dir skyon dang bcas pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is faulty here.

original: ji lta bur zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bur zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: ji ltar dbang phyug rgyur smar bzhin //
analyzed: ji ltar dbang phyug rgyur smar bzhin //
translated: It is like the thesis that God is the cause.

original: rtogs pa la sogs spangs pa yin //
analyzed: rtogs pa la sogs spangs pa yin //
translated: It is devoid of being a knower, etc.

original: khyod kyis kyang bsgrubs pa yin no //
analyzed: khyod kyis kyang bsgrubs pa yin no //
translated: You also accept this.

original: zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //üîΩji ltar dbang phyug rgyur smra ba dag dbang phyug gcig pu rtag pa /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o // ji ltar dbang phyug rgyur smra ba dag dbang phyug gcig pu rtag pa /
translated: This is the remainder of the sentence.üîΩJust as the theists say that the one permanent ƒ™≈õvara is the cause of the entire world,

original: ma skyes pa ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi rgyu yin par smra ba nyid yin la /
analyzed: ma skyes pa ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi rgyu yin par smra ba nyid yin la /
translated: you say that the one permanent self is the cause of the entire world.

original: ma skyes pa nyid kyi rjes su dpag pas mo gsham gyi bu la sogs pa bzhin du yod pa ma yin pas de'i rang gi ngo bo'i khyad par spangs pa sgrub pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ma skyes pa nyid kyi rjes su dpag pas mo gsham gyi bu la sogs pa bzhin du yod pa ma yin pas de'i rang gi ngo bo'i khyad par spangs pa sgrub pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Since the nonarisen is not a cause because it is like the son of a barren woman, you are refuted by your own words because you are proving what is already established.

original: rang gi tshig dang 'gal ba bzlog par dka' ba yin no //
analyzed: rang gi tshig dang 'gal ba bzlog par dka' ba yin no //
translated: It is difficult to reverse the contradiction with your own words.

original: de bzhin du khyod kyi rtogs pa gsal ba yin pa'i phyir dam bcas pa la rang gi tshig gis gnod pa bzlog par dka' ba yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du khyod kyi rtogs pa gsal ba yin pa'i phyir dam bcas pa la rang gi tshig gis gnod pa bzlog par dka' ba yin no //
translated: In the same way, since you accept that the self is a knower, it is difficult to reverse the contradiction with your own words in your thesis.

original: gzhan yang cung zhig //
analyzed: gzhan yang cung zhig //
translated: Moreover, a little bit more:

original: bdag dang bdag gi min rtogs pa //
analyzed: bdag dang bdag gi min rtogs pa //
translated: The conception of the self and that which belongs to the self

original: blo yi rjes su rtogs pa yi //üîΩlta ba log pas grol bar ni //
analyzed: blo yi rjes su rtogs pa yi // lta ba log pas grol bar ni //
translated: is the conception that follows after the mind.üîΩIt is not right for you to say that

original: khyod kyi skyes bur 'gyur mi rigs //
analyzed: khyod kyi skyes bur 'gyur mi rigs //
translated: liberation is attained through a wrong view.

original: blos brtags pa'i rjes su byed pa'i skyes bus bdag kyang 'di'i ma yin la /
analyzed: blos brtags pa'i rjes su byed pa'i skyes bus bdag kyang 'di'i ma yin la /
translated: The person who follows the dictates of the intellect is not even his own self.üîΩ

original: 'di yang bdag gi ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid mthong bskyes par gyur pa yin no zhes grag la /
analyzed: 'di yang bdag gi ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid mthong bskyes par gyur pa yin no zhes grag la /
translated: The person who is influenced by the view of self would say, ‚ÄúI am not the mother of this person, and this person is not my child.‚ÄùüîΩBut when one sees reality, it is said that this view no longer arises.

original: bdag cag gi lugs ni 'di la re zhig mi bden pa'i de kho na nyid mthong pa de las gzhan yin pas rigs pa ma yin no //üîΩskyes bu tha dad mthong ba yis //
analyzed: bdag cag gi lugs ni 'di la re zhig mi bden pa'i de kho na nyid mthong pa de las gzhan yin pas rigs pa ma yin no // skyes bu tha dad mthong ba yis //
translated: But in our system, it is not logical to say that the view of reality is false, because it is different from that.

original: thar pa 'thob pa ma yin te //
analyzed: thar pa 'thob pa ma yin te //
translated: Liberation is not attainedüîΩby seeing the person as different,üîΩbecause the mind is different,

original: blo gzhan yin phyir spyad bya dang // skyes bu gzhan nyid mthong ba bzhin //
analyzed: blo gzhan yin phyir spyad bya dang // skyes bu gzhan nyid mthong ba bzhin //
translated: like seeing a different person.

original: spyad par bya ba gtso bo dang spyod pa po skyes bu dag gang gi tshe /
analyzed: spyad par bya ba gtso bo dang spyod pa po skyes bu dag gang gi tshe /
translated: When the person who is the principal object of action and the person who is the agent

original: tha dad nyid du mthong ba des thar pa 'thob par 'gyur pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tha dad nyid du mthong ba des thar pa 'thob par 'gyur pa ma yin te /
translated: are seen as different, liberation is not attained.

original: gtan tshigs ci yod ce na /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ci yod ce na /
translated: What is the reason?

original: blo gzhan yin pa'i phyir ji ltar spyad @242a * //
analyzed: blo gzhan yin pa'i phyir ji ltar spyad @242a * //
translated: Because the mind is different, like seeing a different person.

original: par bya ba'i bud med dang bdag po gnyis gzhan nyid du mthong ba bzhin no /üîΩ// / dbu ma'i snying po'i 'grel pa rtog ge 'bar ba /
analyzed: par bya ba'i bud med dang bdag po gnyis gzhan nyid du mthong ba bzhin no / // / dbu ma'i snying po'i 'grel pa rtog ge 'bar ba /
translated: It is like the case of seeing the woman and the owner as different.

original: bam po nyi shu gcig pa /üîΩgzhan yang / ji ltar rnam rtog bcas pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bam po nyi shu gcig pa / gzhan yang / ji ltar rnam rtog bcas pa'i phyir //
translated: The Blaze of Argument, a commentary on the Heart of the Middle WayüîΩMoreover, just as a man

original: mi ni tha dad mthong ba ltar //
analyzed: mi ni tha dad mthong ba ltar //
translated: is seen as different because of conceptualization,

original: skyes bu tha dad mthong ba yis //
analyzed: skyes bu tha dad mthong ba yis //
translated: so, because of seeing the person as different,

original: de bzhin grol bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: de bzhin grol bar mi 'dod do //
translated: liberation is not accepted.

original: ji ltar 'jig rten na bud med dang // skyes bu tha dad du mthong ba yang thar pa ma yin par grags te /
analyzed: ji ltar 'jig rten na bud med dang // skyes bu tha dad du mthong ba yang thar pa ma yin par grags te /
translated: Just as it is well known that seeing a woman and a man as different is not liberation,

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: why is that?

original: rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it is a conceptual representation.

original: de bzhin du rang bzhin dang skyes bu yang tha dad par mthong du zin kyang thar pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rang bzhin dang skyes bu yang tha dad par mthong du zin kyang thar pa ma yin te /
translated: Similarly, even though one sees intrinsic nature and the person as different, it is not liberation,

original: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i bsam pas so //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i bsam pas so //
translated: because it is conceptual. This is the idea.

original: ma lus par zad par gyur pa ni thar pa'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir bya ba dang bral ba 'di'i tha dad du mthong ba ji ltar rigs pa yin //
analyzed: ma lus par zad par gyur pa ni thar pa'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir bya ba dang bral ba 'di'i tha dad du mthong ba ji ltar rigs pa yin //
translated: In order to demonstrate that the complete exhaustion of all of these is liberation, how could it be logical to see this freedom from action as a separate thing?üîΩTherefore, since the faults that were previously taught are included in the complete perfection of the treatise, it is extremely illogical.

original: des na rab tu byed pa yongs su rdzogs par sngar bstan pa'i skyon rnams bsdus pa nyid kyis shin tu mi rigs pa yin pas gzhan gyi gzhung yongs su spang bar bya ba'i phyir smras pa /
analyzed: des na rab tu byed pa yongs su rdzogs par sngar bstan pa'i skyon rnams bsdus pa nyid kyis shin tu mi rigs pa yin pas gzhan gyi gzhung yongs su spang bar bya ba'i phyir smras pa /
translated: Thus, in order to completely abandon the treatises of others, it is said:

original: de ltar grangs can de nyid ni //
analyzed: de ltar grangs can de nyid ni //
translated: In this way, the reality of the Enumerators

original: sngon dang phyi mar 'gal ba dang // rigs pa dang ni mi ldan la //
analyzed: sngon dang phyi mar 'gal ba dang // rigs pa dang ni mi ldan la //
translated: Is contradictory in terms of prior and subsequent,

original: mkhas pa rnams kyi blo mi 'jug / gang gi phyir skyon med pa'i sgrub pa ni rigs pa yin la /
analyzed: mkhas pa rnams kyi blo mi 'jug / gang gi phyir skyon med pa'i sgrub pa ni rigs pa yin la /
translated: And is not endowed with logic.

original: grangs can gyis mngon par 'dod pa'i don dam pa de ni shin tu rigs pa dang bral zhing sngon dang phyi mar 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: grangs can gyis mngon par 'dod pa'i don dam pa de ni shin tu rigs pa dang bral zhing sngon dang phyi mar 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Since a faultless proof is logic, the ultimate that is asserted by the Enumerators is completely devoid of logic and is contradictory in terms of prior and subsequent.

original: ji skad smras pa'i lugs de la mkhas ba rnams gzhol bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar smras pa /
analyzed: ji skad smras pa'i lugs de la mkhas ba rnams gzhol bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar smras pa /
translated: The wise will not be attracted to the system that you have described.üîΩThe nyagrodha tree
