original: sdig pa la sogs pa'i byed pa po yod pa'i skyon yod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: sdig pa la sogs pa'i byed pa po yod pa'i skyon yod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: The error of the existence of the agent of sin and so on would arise.

original: lus la gnas kyang ma chags dang // spyod par byed kyang mi gos te //
analyzed: lus la gnas kyang ma chags dang // spyod par byed kyang mi gos te //
translated: he engages in activity, but is not defiled.

original: 'dod bzhin spyod kyang rgyal po bzhin //
analyzed: 'dod bzhin spyod kyang rgyal po bzhin //
translated: He acts as he wishes, like a king.

original: sdig pas gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sdig pas gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He is not harmed by evil.

original: ji ltar 'dis lus thams cad la gnas pa yin du zin kyang de lta na yang ma chags pa nyid yin pa dang / yul rnams la spyod du zin kyang yul gyis kyang gos pa med de /
analyzed: ji ltar 'dis lus thams cad la gnas pa yin du zin kyang de lta na yang ma chags pa nyid yin pa dang / yul rnams la spyod du zin kyang yul gyis kyang gos pa med de /
translated: Even though he abides in the entire body, he is not attached. Even though he engages in activity in the objects, he is not defiled by the objects.

original: ji ltar rgyal po 'dod pa bzhin du spyod du zin kyang phyir gnod pa byed pa med pa de bzhin no //
analyzed: ji ltar rgyal po 'dod pa bzhin du spyod du zin kyang phyir gnod pa byed pa med pa de bzhin no //
translated: He acts as he wishes, like a king, but is not harmed by evil.

original: 'di yang thams cad kyi dbang phyug yin pa'i phyir sdig pa spyod du zin kyang sdig pa'i 'bras bu'i snod du ni mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di yang thams cad kyi dbang phyug yin pa'i phyir sdig pa spyod du zin kyang sdig pa'i 'bras bu'i snod du ni mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And because he is the lord of all, he is not a vessel for the results of evil, even though he engages in evil.

original: de bzhin du ji skad bstan pa'i rim pas /
analyzed: de bzhin du ji skad bstan pa'i rim pas /
translated: In the same way, by the process that has been taught,

original: gcig pu kun khyab rtag pa ste //
analyzed: gcig pu kun khyab rtag pa ste //
translated: he is one, all-pervading, and eternal.

original: tshangs mchog 'chi ba med pa'i gnas //
analyzed: tshangs mchog 'chi ba med pa'i gnas //
translated: He is the supreme Brahman, the immortal state.

original: rnal 'byor pa yis goms byas na //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yis goms byas na //
translated: When the yogi cultivates him,

original: de ni yang srid len mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni yang srid len mi 'gyur //
translated: he does not take rebirth.

original: lus thams cad kyi dbang phyug yin pa'i phyir gcig bu'o //
analyzed: lus thams cad kyi dbang phyug yin pa'i phyir gcig bu'o //
translated: It is unique because it is the lord of the entire body.

original: 'gro ba thams cad la khyab pa yin pa'i phyir kun khyab bo //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad la khyab pa yin pa'i phyir kun khyab bo //
translated: It is all-pervading because it pervades the entire world.

original: nyams pa med pa'i phyir rtag pa'o //
analyzed: nyams pa med pa'i phyir rtag pa'o //
translated: It is eternal because it is indestructible.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir tshangs pa'o //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir tshangs pa'o //
translated: It is pure because it is the nature of nirvana.

original: phul du byung ba yin pas mchog go //
analyzed: phul du byung ba yin pas mchog go //
translated: It is supreme because it is the best.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i phyir 'chi ba med pa'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i phyir 'chi ba med pa'o //
translated: It is immortal because it has no beginning or end.

original: dmigs pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir gnas so //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir gnas so //
translated: It is the abode because it is the basis of perception.

original: rnal 'byor pa ni bsam gtan gyi sbyor bas dmigs par byed pa ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa ni bsam gtan gyi sbyor bas dmigs par byed pa ste /
translated: The yogi perceives it through the practice of meditation.

original: 'di ltar nges par @254b goms bar byas pa na 'di lta bu'i tshangs pa kun du rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar nges par @254b goms bar byas pa na 'di lta bu'i tshangs pa kun du rtogs pa yin te /
translated: Thus, when one becomes accustomed to this, one realizes such a brahman.

original: des na de'i yang srid ldog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na de'i yang srid ldog par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, one turns away from rebirth.

original: dge ba dang mi dge ba la sogs pa dang nye bar spyod pa log par gyur pa'i bdag de'i mtshan nyid nye bar bsngags pa ni /
analyzed: dge ba dang mi dge ba la sogs pa dang nye bar spyod pa log par gyur pa'i bdag de'i mtshan nyid nye bar bsngags pa ni /
translated: The praise of the characteristics of the self, which is the cessation of virtuous and nonvirtuous actions, is stated:

original: de ni rtag par rtog med pa //
analyzed: de ni rtag par rtog med pa //
translated: It is always nonconceptual.

original: gang gi spyod yul gang mi gyur //
analyzed: gang gi spyod yul gang mi gyur //
translated: It is not the domain of the intellect.

original: blo ni dbye bas phrogs rnams kyis //
analyzed: blo ni dbye bas phrogs rnams kyis //
translated: The intellect is carried away by the division of the parts,

original: de la tshig tu spyor bar byed //
analyzed: de la tshig tu spyor bar byed //
translated: and it applies the word to that.

original: tshangs pa de ni dus thams cad du rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis dmigs par bya ba yin pa'i phyir rtag pa'o //
analyzed: tshangs pa de ni dus thams cad du rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis dmigs par bya ba yin pa'i phyir rtag pa'o //
translated: Brahman is eternal because it is the object of the yogi's perception at all times.

original: dbang po dang rnam par shes pa las gzhan nyid yin pa'i phyir rtog pa med pa'o ;
analyzed: dbang po dang rnam par shes pa las gzhan nyid yin pa'i phyir rtog pa med pa'o ;
translated: It is nonconceptual because it is different from the sense faculties and consciousness.

original: / blo dag gi spyod yul du gyur pa ni tshig brjod pa rnams kyi yang yul yin par 'gyur la /
analyzed: / blo dag gi spyod yul du gyur pa ni tshig brjod pa rnams kyi yang yul yin par 'gyur la /
translated: That which is the domain of the intellect becomes the object of verbal expression.

original: blo'i spyod yul du ma gyur pa nyid de ni tshig gi spyod yul yang ma yin no //
analyzed: blo'i spyod yul du ma gyur pa nyid de ni tshig gi spyod yul yang ma yin no //
translated: That which is not the domain of the intellect is not the domain of words.

original: 'on kyang dbye bas phrogs ba ni dbye ba la nye par song ba'i blo ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang dbye bas phrogs ba ni dbye ba la nye par song ba'i blo ste /
translated: However, the intellect is carried away by the division of the parts, the intellect that has approached the division.

original: de gang la yod pa ni blo ni dbye bas 'phrogs pa'o //
analyzed: de gang la yod pa ni blo ni dbye bas 'phrogs pa'o //
translated: That which has that is the intellect carried away by the division of the parts.

original: des de la tshangs pa'o zhes tshig sbyor bar byed de /
analyzed: des de la tshangs pa'o zhes tshig sbyor bar byed de /
translated: By that, it applies the word Brahman to that.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: bdag dang / skyes bu dang / dbang phyug dang / kun la khyab pa dang / rtag pa zhes bya ba la sogs par ro //
analyzed: bdag dang / skyes bu dang / dbang phyug dang / kun la khyab pa dang / rtag pa zhes bya ba la sogs par ro //
translated: as self, person, lord, all-pervading, permanent, and so on.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: kun du tha snyad du bya ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: kun du tha snyad du bya ba'i phyir te /
translated: In order to engage in conventional usage,

original: gzhan dag gis ji ltar bdag gi don ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par 'gyur zhes bya bar ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag gis ji ltar bdag gi don ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par 'gyur zhes bya bar ro //
translated: so that others can understand it in the same way that we understand the self.

original: 'di'i ngo bo ni brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i ngo bo ni brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid yin te /
translated: The nature of the self is not expressible.üîΩThe Vedas declare:

original: rig byed las rang byung byed pa med pa bong tshad med pa ste /
analyzed: rig byed las rang byung byed pa med pa bong tshad med pa ste /
translated: The self is not created, is without parts, and is without measure.

original: mun pa las gzhan pa'i skyes bu ni /
analyzed: mun pa las gzhan pa'i skyes bu ni /
translated: The self is different from darkness.

original: skyes bu drang srong chen po nyi ma'i mdog / mun pa las gzhan gyur ba de rig na //
analyzed: skyes bu drang srong chen po nyi ma'i mdog / mun pa las gzhan gyur ba de rig na //
translated: The self is the great sage, the color of the sun, different from darkness.

original: 'chi ba med par 'gyur te bdag gis rtogs //
analyzed: 'chi ba med par 'gyur te bdag gis rtogs //
translated: Knowing that, one becomes immortal. I have understood.

original: skye med gnas 'gro ba la lam gzhan med //
analyzed: skye med gnas 'gro ba la lam gzhan med //
translated: There is no other path for beings to go to the deathless state.

original: ces bya ba dang / de bzhin du /üîΩde ni phra gyur skye gnas rnams na gcig pu nas //
analyzed: ces bya ba dang / de bzhin du / de ni phra gyur skye gnas rnams na gcig pu nas //
translated: And similarly:üîΩIt is subtle, alone in the places of birth,

original: de ni rgyas pa 'di dag yang dag bsags pa yin //
analyzed: de ni rgyas pa 'di dag yang dag bsags pa yin //
translated: and it is that which accumulates these extensive collections.

original: de ni gtso bo mchog dang lha dang bstod bya ste //
analyzed: de ni gtso bo mchog dang lha dang bstod bya ste //
translated: He is the supreme, the divine, the one to be praised.

original: bdag nges bzung nas shin tu zhi bar 'gro bar 'gyur //
analyzed: bdag nges bzung nas shin tu zhi bar 'gro bar 'gyur //
translated: Having grasped the self, he goes to complete peace.

original: gang las mchog tu gyur pa gzhan pa 'ga' yang med //
analyzed: gang las mchog tu gyur pa gzhan pa 'ga' yang med //
translated: There is no one else who is more supreme than him.

original: gang las phra dang gtso bor gyur pa gzhan 'ga'ang med //
analyzed: gang las phra dang gtso bor gyur pa gzhan 'ga'ang med //
translated: There is no one else who is more subtle and principal than him.

original: ma bkag bsgribs pa med par lha de gcig pu gnas //
analyzed: ma bkag bsgribs pa med par lha de gcig pu gnas //
translated: That god abides alone, unobstructed and unobscured.

original: skyes bu de yang kun la khyab cing rgyas //üîΩphra ba bas kyang @255a * //
analyzed: skyes bu de yang kun la khyab cing rgyas // phra ba bas kyang @255a * //
translated: That person also pervades and fills everything.üîΩSubtler than the subtle,

original: phra zhing che bas che //
analyzed: phra zhing che bas che //
translated: greater than the great,

original: 'gro rnams bdag gi yon tan khyab nas gnas //
analyzed: 'gro rnams bdag gi yon tan khyab nas gnas //
translated: he abides pervading the qualities of beings.

original: mya ngan bral bas mchod spyin med par mthong //
analyzed: mya ngan bral bas mchod spyin med par mthong //
translated: Seeing him, free from sorrow, there is no sacrifice.

original: khams rnams dang ba gtso bo'i che ba nyid //
analyzed: khams rnams dang ba gtso bo'i che ba nyid //
translated: The greatness of the principal one is the clarity of the elements.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: Similarly:

original: lus med pa yi lus la ni //
analyzed: lus med pa yi lus la ni //
translated: In the body that is without a body,

original: kun du gnas med gnas pa ni //
analyzed: kun du gnas med gnas pa ni //
translated: the abode that is without an abode,

original: chen por gtso bo'i bdag nyid de //
analyzed: chen por gtso bo'i bdag nyid de //
translated: the great one, the nature of the principal one,

original: shes nas mkhas pa mya ngan med //
analyzed: shes nas mkhas pa mya ngan med //
translated: the wise one, having known, is without sorrow.

original: de bzhin du /üîΩg-yo ba de yin mi g-yo de //
analyzed: de bzhin du / g-yo ba de yin mi g-yo de //
translated: Similarly:üîΩThat is movement, that is immobility,

original: ring ba de yin nye ba de //
analyzed: ring ba de yin nye ba de //
translated: that is far, that is near,

original: nang yang de yin thams cad kyi //
analyzed: nang yang de yin thams cad kyi //
translated: and also internally,

original: gnyi ga de yin phyi rol nyid //
analyzed: gnyi ga de yin phyi rol nyid //
translated: and also both externally and internally.

original: de bzhin du /üîΩdar gyi srin bu'i snal ma bzhin //
analyzed: de bzhin du / dar gyi srin bu'i snal ma bzhin //
translated: And similarly:üîΩLike the thread of a silkworm,

original: chu shel nor bu'i chu bzhin du //
analyzed: chu shel nor bu'i chu bzhin du //
translated: like the water in a water-crystal gem,

original: bya gro yan lag zug rgyu bzhin //
analyzed: bya gro yan lag zug rgyu bzhin //
translated: like the pain in a tooth,

original: de ni lus can kun gyi rgyu //
analyzed: de ni lus can kun gyi rgyu //
translated: it is the cause of all embodied beings.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rig byed kyi lung las mthong ba'i tshad mas skyes bu mthong ba zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid yin te //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rig byed kyi lung las mthong ba'i tshad mas skyes bu mthong ba zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid yin te //
translated: The so-called ‚Äúvision of the person‚Äù is reality, which is seen by the valid knowledge of seeing, as stated in the Vedic scriptures.

original: gzhan gyis nyams par bya bar mi nus so zhes bya ba ni rig byed kyi mtha' smra ba rnams kyis bkod pa'i phyogs snga ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyis nyams par bya bar mi nus so zhes bya ba ni rig byed kyi mtha' smra ba rnams kyis bkod pa'i phyogs snga ma yin no //
translated: The statement ‚Äúit cannot be destroyed by another‚Äù is the opponent‚Äôs position set forth by the VedƒÅntins.

original: de la lan brjod par bya ba'i phyir bstan bcos byed pas smras pa /
analyzed: de la lan brjod par bya ba'i phyir bstan bcos byed pas smras pa /
translated: In order to respond to that, the author of the treatise says:

original: phyogs su lhung ba ma yin pas //
analyzed: phyogs su lhung ba ma yin pas //
translated: Since it is not partial,

original: 'dir ni 'di yang 'di ltar dpyad //
analyzed: 'dir ni 'di yang 'di ltar dpyad //
translated: here it is analyzed in this way.

original: phyogs la chags bas bsgribs pa'i blos //
analyzed: phyogs la chags bas bsgribs pa'i blos //
translated: The mind obscured by attachment to a position

original: ji ltar bden pa'ang rtogs mi 'gyur //
analyzed: ji ltar bden pa'ang rtogs mi 'gyur //
translated: will not understand the truth.

original: 'dir ni zhes bya ba ni rig byed kyi mtha' smra ba rnams kyis bkod pa'i phyogs snga mar ro //
analyzed: 'dir ni zhes bya ba ni rig byed kyi mtha' smra ba rnams kyis bkod pa'i phyogs snga mar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúHere‚Äù refers to the opponent‚Äôs position set forth by the VedƒÅntins.

original: 'di yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni sngar bstan pa'i rab tu byed par dpyad pa byas pa yang nye bar bsdu ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni sngar bstan pa'i rab tu byed par dpyad pa byas pa yang nye bar bsdu ba'i don to //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù means that the analysis in the previous chapter is also included.

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya ba'i don gyis dngos po'i tshig dpyad pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya ba'i don gyis dngos po'i tshig dpyad pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThus‚Äù means that the meaning of the statement is analyzed with the words of the treatise.

original: 'di ltar brtag par bya /
analyzed: 'di ltar brtag par bya /
translated: Thus, one should investigate.

original: 'di ltar dpyad par bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'di ltar dpyad par bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means that one should analyze.

original: su zhig dpyod par byed ce na /
analyzed: su zhig dpyod par byed ce na /
translated: Who analyzes?

original: gang dag rang dang gzhan gyi phyogs la rigs sam mi rigs pa dpyad pa byas nas rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba mi 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: gang dag rang dang gzhan gyi phyogs la rigs sam mi rigs pa dpyad pa byas nas rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba mi 'byung ba'o //
translated: Those who, having analyzed what is reasonable or unreasonable in one‚Äôs own and others‚Äô positions, do not give rise to attachment or aversion.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gi phyir phyogs su lhung bas dri ma can du byas pa'i sems kyis ni skyon med pa'i tshig dag la yang yid ches par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir phyogs su lhung bas dri ma can du byas pa'i sems kyis ni skyon med pa'i tshig dag la yang yid ches par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Because a mind that is defiled by bias will not have confidence in words that are faultless.

original: rang gi phyogs la chags pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi phyogs la chags pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is attached to its own position.

original: de kho na nyid kyi shes pa tshol ba'i rab tu byed pa dang / grangs can dang phye brag pa'i de kho na nyid brtag pa'i dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi shes pa tshol ba'i rab tu byed pa dang / grangs can dang phye brag pa'i de kho na nyid brtag pa'i dbang du byas nas /
translated: The investigation of the reality of the SƒÅ·πÉkhya and Vai≈õe·π£ika is undertaken in the following.

original: bdag yod pa ni @255b bkag pas na //
analyzed: bdag yod pa ni @255b bkag pas na //
translated: The existence of the self is refuted,

original: 'gro ba'i rgyu yang de bzhin te //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i rgyu yang de bzhin te //
translated: and so too the cause of the world.

original: des na de mthong grol ba ni //
analyzed: des na de mthong grol ba ni //
translated: Therefore seeing that, liberation

original: mi bden par ni rab brtags nyid //
analyzed: mi bden par ni rab brtags nyid //
translated: is thoroughly imagined to be false.

original: bdag yod pa nyid du yang bsgrub par shin tu dka' ste /
analyzed: bdag yod pa nyid du yang bsgrub par shin tu dka' ste /
translated: It is very difficult to establish the existence of the self.

original: ji skad du sngar bstan pa'i rigs pas yod par yang ma grub na /
analyzed: ji skad du sngar bstan pa'i rigs pas yod par yang ma grub na /
translated: As was previously explained, if it does not exist,

original: bden pa ma yin pa de mthong bas yang dag par grol bar lta ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: bden pa ma yin pa de mthong bas yang dag par grol bar lta ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: how could liberation be seeing that which is not true?

original: yod pa ma yin pa'i ri bong gi rva ni dmigs par 'gyur ba ma yin pa bzhin du de mthong bas kyang grol bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin pa'i ri bong gi rva ni dmigs par 'gyur ba ma yin pa bzhin du de mthong bas kyang grol bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: Just as the horns of a rabbit are not observed, liberation is not seeing that.

original: skyes bur blta ba la skyon chen po 'di yang yod de /
analyzed: skyes bur blta ba la skyon chen po 'di yang yod de /
translated: This great fault also arises in the view of the person.

original: byol song rnams la 'jig tshogs lta //
analyzed: byol song rnams la 'jig tshogs lta //
translated: The view of the perishable composite exists in the animals,

original: lhan cig skyes yod zhi ma gyur //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes yod zhi ma gyur //
translated: but it is not pacified.

original: kun nyon mongs kun rtsa ba'i phyir //
analyzed: kun nyon mongs kun rtsa ba'i phyir //
translated: Since it is the root of all affliction,

original: de nyid khyod kyis shin tu spel //üîΩsdug bsngal bar gyur pas na 'jig pa yin la bsags pa na tshogs te /
analyzed: de nyid khyod kyis shin tu spel // sdug bsngal bar gyur pas na 'jig pa yin la bsags pa na tshogs te /
translated: you have greatly increased it.

original: de ni 'jig pa yang yin la /
analyzed: de ni 'jig pa yang yin la /
translated: It is a perishable composite because it is perishable since it is suffering and it is a collection since it is accumulated.

original: tshogs pa yang yin pas 'jig tshogs so //
analyzed: tshogs pa yang yin pas 'jig tshogs so //
translated: It is a perishable composite because it is both perishable and a collection.

original: de la gang mngon bar zhen pa ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba ste /
analyzed: de la gang mngon bar zhen pa ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba ste /
translated: The view of the perishable composite is the adherence to that.

original: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po la bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po la bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'o //
translated: It is the apprehension of the five aggregates as the self and that which belongs to the self.

original: de ni thog ma med pa'i dus nas bdag tu 'dzin pa'i bag chags kyis bsgos pa'i ba lang la sogs pa dud 'gro rnams kyi sems dag gi spyod pa dang bral ba /
analyzed: de ni thog ma med pa'i dus nas bdag tu 'dzin pa'i bag chags kyis bsgos pa'i ba lang la sogs pa dud 'gro rnams kyi sems dag gi spyod pa dang bral ba /
translated: It is not pacified in the animals, such as cows, etc., whose minds are tainted by the instinct of selfgrasping since beginningless time.

original: der rtogs par mi byed pa rnams la yang zhi ba sgrub par byed pa ma yin no /
analyzed: der rtogs par mi byed pa rnams la yang zhi ba sgrub par byed pa ma yin no /
translated: It is not even pacified in those who do not understand it as such.

original: yang blo'i brjod pa dang ldan pa'i mi rnams bdag tu lta ba du ma'i rnam par rtog pa yod pa tshig tu brjod pa dang bcas pas gzhan dag kyang 'dzin du 'jug pa rnams la ji ltar zhi ba sgrub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: yang blo'i brjod pa dang ldan pa'i mi rnams bdag tu lta ba du ma'i rnam par rtog pa yod pa tshig tu brjod pa dang bcas pas gzhan dag kyang 'dzin du 'jug pa rnams la ji ltar zhi ba sgrub par 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, how can those who are endowed with the verbal expressions of the mind, who have the discursive thought of the many views of self, who are accompanied by the verbal expressions of others, achieve peace?

original: des na 'di ni rigs pa'i tshul ma yin pa yin no //
analyzed: des na 'di ni rigs pa'i tshul ma yin pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is not the way of reasoning.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is the root of all afflictions.

original: bdag tung rgyal ba dang / bdag tu rmongs pa dang / bdag tu lta ba dang / bdag la chags pa la sogs pas nyon mongs pa can du byas pa yod pa las 'jig tshogs la lta ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag tung rgyal ba dang / bdag tu rmongs pa dang / bdag tu lta ba dang / bdag la chags pa la sogs pas nyon mongs pa can du byas pa yod pa las 'jig tshogs la lta ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the afflicted view of the self is the afflicted view of the transitory collection, which is produced by the afflictions of self-conceit, self-delusion, self-view, and self-attachment, and so on.

original: de ni khyed kyis shin tu 'phel bar byas pa yin na de la ji ltar thar pa yod par 'gyur /
analyzed: de ni khyed kyis shin tu 'phel bar byas pa yin na de la ji ltar thar pa yod par 'gyur /
translated: Since you greatly increase that, how can there be liberation for you?

original: 'jig tshogs lta la zhen pa yi //
analyzed: 'jig tshogs lta la zhen pa yi //
translated: Those who are attached to the view of the transitory collection

original: bdag 'dzin bdag gir 'dzin pa dag / gang las 'khor ba 'byung 'gyur ba //
analyzed: bdag 'dzin bdag gir 'dzin pa dag / gang las 'khor ba 'byung 'gyur ba //
translated: The self-habit and the mine-habit are the source of cyclic existence.

original: de nyid grol ba yin par smra //üîΩ@256a * // bdag gzugs yin /
analyzed: de nyid grol ba yin par smra // @256a * // bdag gzugs yin /
translated: You say that very thing is the cause of liberation.üîΩThe self is form.

original: bdag gzugs dang ldan /üîΩgzugs bdag gi yin /
analyzed: bdag gzugs dang ldan / gzugs bdag gi yin /
translated: The self possesses form.üîΩForm is mine.

original: gzugs la bdag gnas /
analyzed: gzugs la bdag gnas /
translated: The self is in form.

original: bdag tshor ba yin /üîΩbdag tshor ba dang ldan /
analyzed: bdag tshor ba yin / bdag tshor ba dang ldan /
translated: The self is feeling.üîΩThe self possesses feeling.üîΩFeeling is mine.

original: tshor ba bdag gi yin /
analyzed: tshor ba bdag gi yin /
translated: The self is in feeling.

original: tshor ba la bdag gnas zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba rnam par bcom nas de kho na nyid mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes thams cad rig pa nyid kyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: tshor ba la bdag gnas zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba rnam par bcom nas de kho na nyid mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes thams cad rig pa nyid kyis gsungs pa /
translated: Having destroyed the twenty high peaks of the mountain of the view of the transitory collection, you will see reality.

original: phyin ci log gi lta ba can bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i gdon gyis zin pas sems brlams par gyur pa khyod kyis ni /
analyzed: phyin ci log gi lta ba can bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i gdon gyis zin pas sems brlams par gyur pa khyod kyis ni /
translated: You, who have the view of the transitory collection, who are possessed by the demon of the self-habit and the mine-habit, who are insane,

original: gang las 'khor ba mngon bar 'phel bar 'gyur ba de nyid grol ba'i rgyu yin no zhes zer te /
analyzed: gang las 'khor ba mngon bar 'phel bar 'gyur ba de nyid grol ba'i rgyu yin no zhes zer te /
translated: say that the very thing that is the source of the increase of cyclic existence is the cause of liberation.

original: de ni 'di ltar rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa'i me la zhi par bya ba'i phyir bud shing shin tu mang ba bsnan par gyur pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa'i me la zhi par bya ba'i phyir bud shing shin tu mang ba bsnan par gyur pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like adding a great deal of fuel to a fire that is already burning.

original: 'dir gzhan gyis smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir gzhan gyis smras pa /
translated: Here, an opponent says:

original: gang gang gi zhi ba'i rgyur gyur pa ma yin pa de yang tshul 'ga' zhig gis zhi ba'i rgyur yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gang gi zhi ba'i rgyur gyur pa ma yin pa de yang tshul 'ga' zhig gis zhi ba'i rgyur yang 'gyur te /
translated: That which is not a cause of pacification can also be a cause of pacification in some way.üîΩFor example, by relying on alcohol, which is intoxicating, one becomes intoxicated.

original: ji ltar chang shin tu bsten pas myos par gyur pa la yang myos par 'gyur ba nyid bsten na /
analyzed: ji ltar chang shin tu bsten pas myos par gyur pa la yang myos par 'gyur ba nyid bsten na /
translated: But by relying on it again,

original: phan par 'gyur bde bzhin du /
analyzed: phan par 'gyur bde bzhin du /
translated: one is helped.

original: thabs la mi mkhas pas bdag tu lta ba bsten pas bdag tu lta ba bsten pas kun nag nyon mongs pa skye bar 'gyur la //
analyzed: thabs la mi mkhas pas bdag tu lta ba bsten pas bdag tu lta ba bsten pas kun nag nyon mongs pa skye bar 'gyur la //
translated: In the same way, by relying on the view of the transitory collection, which is the cause of the afflictions, the afflictions arise.

original: rnal 'byor gyi lugs 'ba' zhig gis bdag tu lta ba de nyid goms par byas pa las nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi lugs 'ba' zhig gis bdag tu lta ba de nyid goms par byas pa las nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But by relying on the view of the transitory collection alone, in the manner of a yogi, the afflictions are pacified.

original: de la brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de la brjod par bya ste /
translated: To this we reply:

original: myos par gyur la myos 'gyur bzhin //
analyzed: myos par gyur la myos 'gyur bzhin //
translated: Like alcohol for one who is intoxicated,

original: de lta ba yis zhi 'gyur na //
analyzed: de lta ba yis zhi 'gyur na //
translated: If the view of the transitory collection pacifies the afflictions,

original: shin tu ma zhu'i nad ldan la //
analyzed: shin tu ma zhu'i nad ldan la //
translated: For one afflicted with indigestion,

original: kha zas zos pas phan par 'gyur //
analyzed: kha zas zos pas phan par 'gyur //
translated: food is beneficial.

original: gang la gang gis gnod par gyur pa des ;
analyzed: gang la gang gis gnod par gyur pa des ;
translated: It is not definite that whatever is harmful for someone

original: de nyid zhi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gcig tu ma nges pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid zhi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gcig tu ma nges pa yin no //
translated: will be beneficial for that very person.

original: gal te nges par gyur na ni shin tu ma zhu ba'i skyon dang bcas par gyur pa de la yang kha zas zos pas phan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te nges par gyur na ni shin tu ma zhu ba'i skyon dang bcas par gyur pa de la yang kha zas zos pas phan par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were definite, then food would be beneficial even for one afflicted with indigestion.

original: gal te dug la yang dug nyid phan par gyur pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gal te dug la yang dug nyid phan par gyur pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it the case that poison is not beneficial for anyone?üîΩEven the statement ‚ÄúPoison is cured by poison‚Äù is not definite.

original: dug gis dug zhi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de yang ma nges pa nyid yin na nor bu dang / sngags dang sman la sogs pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan na /
analyzed: dug gis dug zhi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de yang ma nges pa nyid yin na nor bu dang / sngags dang sman la sogs pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan na /
translated: But if it is applied with the right combination of jewel, mantra, and medicine,üîΩit is definitely beneficial.

original: nges pa yin pa bzhin du lam goms par byas na legs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: nges pa yin pa bzhin du lam goms par byas na legs pa yin gyi /
translated: In the same way, it is good to cultivate the path,

original: bdag tu lta bas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag tu lta bas ni ma yin no //
translated: but not the view of self.

original: gzhan yang / rig byed sbra pas bdag de ni //
analyzed: gzhan yang / rig byed sbra pas bdag de ni //
translated: Moreover,üîΩthe Vedas assert that self

original: @256b rnam pa gnyis su 'dod byed de //
analyzed: @256b rnam pa gnyis su 'dod byed de //
translated: is twofold.

original: lus zhes bya ba bcings bdag dang // mchog na gnas pa grol pa'i bdag / mchog tu 'dzin pa bdag gi yul //
analyzed: lus zhes bya ba bcings bdag dang // mchog na gnas pa grol pa'i bdag / mchog tu 'dzin pa bdag gi yul //
translated: The self is bound when it is in the body, and the self is liberated when it is in the supreme.

original: bdag blo ji bzhin don ma yin //
analyzed: bdag blo ji bzhin don ma yin //
translated: The supreme is the object of the self, but the self is not as it is conceived to be.

original: bdag ni 'di zhes mchog 'dzin phyir //
analyzed: bdag ni 'di zhes mchog 'dzin phyir //
translated: The self is conceived to be supreme because of the thought ‚ÄúI am this.‚Äù

original: lus la bdag gi blo bzhin no //
analyzed: lus la bdag gi blo bzhin no //
translated: The self is conceived to be in the body, just as the thought of the body arises in regard to the body.

original: mchog gi gnas na gnas pas mchog na gnas pa'o //
analyzed: mchog gi gnas na gnas pas mchog na gnas pa'o //
translated: The supreme is the supreme state.

original: gang zhe na bdag go //
analyzed: gang zhe na bdag go //
translated: What is that? The self.

original: yul de gang la yod pa de ni de'i yul can te gang zhe na blo'o //
analyzed: yul de gang la yod pa de ni de'i yul can te gang zhe na blo'o //
translated: The self is the subject that possesses that object. What is that? The thought.

original: de ni don ji lta ba bzhin ma yin no zhes bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de ni don ji lta ba bzhin ma yin no zhes bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: It is not as it is conceived to be. This must be proven.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bdag ni 'di lta bu'o zhes de la rgyu ba 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag ni 'di lta bu'o zhes de la rgyu ba 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the thought ‚ÄúI am this‚Äù arises in regard to it.

original: ci lta bur zhe na /üîΩlus dang / dbang po dang / yul bdag gi blo byung ba bzhin no //
analyzed: ci lta bur zhe na / lus dang / dbang po dang / yul bdag gi blo byung ba bzhin no //
translated: What is it like?üîΩThe thought of the body and the thought of the object arise in regard to the body, just as the thought of the self arises in regard to the body.

original: lus dang yul gyi blo nyid ni kun rdzob tu don ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: lus dang yul gyi blo nyid ni kun rdzob tu don ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: The thought of the body and the thought of the object arise in regard to the body and the object, respectively, in a manner that is consistent with reality.

original: mngon sum nyid kyis nye bar dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum nyid kyis nye bar dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is perceived by direct perception.

original: mchog na gnas pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mchog na gnas pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that it exists in the supreme,

original: nye bar ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye bar ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not perceived.

original: gal te yang dus ring por bdag tu mngon par zhen pa'i bag chags kyi stobs kyis 'di la bdag ces yongs su rtog go zhen /
analyzed: gal te yang dus ring por bdag tu mngon par zhen pa'i bag chags kyi stobs kyis 'di la bdag ces yongs su rtog go zhen /
translated: If you think that the self is imagined to exist through the power of the latent propensities of the conception of self that has operated for a long time,üîΩthen the phrase ‚Äúeven though it is imagined‚Äù does not establish anything at all.

original: yongs su brtags pas zhes bya bas ni don ci yang sgrub pa ma yin pas des na smras pa /
analyzed: yongs su brtags pas zhes bya bas ni don ci yang sgrub pa ma yin pas des na smras pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: yongs su brtags pas yod na yang //
analyzed: yongs su brtags pas yod na yang //
translated: Even though it is imagined,

original: khyod kyis bdag gis ci zhig byed //
analyzed: khyod kyis bdag gis ci zhig byed //
translated: what use is it to you?üîΩIf you say that it is the mind that experiences

original: gzugs dang sgra sogs yul rnams la //üîΩblo'o zhe na de mi rigs //
analyzed: gzugs dang sgra sogs yul rnams la // blo'o zhe na de mi rigs //
translated: forms, sounds, and so on, that is illogical.

original: rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it illogical?üîΩEven though the person who is the lord of the body is not found,

original: lus thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi skyes bu yongs su brtags bde med du zin kyang /
analyzed: lus thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi skyes bu yongs su brtags bde med du zin kyang /
translated: the mind that experiences

original: gzugs sogs yul la blo dag ni //üîΩbyed po bdag ni med kyang skye //
analyzed: gzugs sogs yul la blo dag ni // byed po bdag ni med kyang skye //
translated: forms and so on arises.

original: rkyen la ltos pa'i skye yin phyir //
analyzed: rkyen la ltos pa'i skye yin phyir //
translated: Because it arises in dependence on conditions,

original: me shel gyi ni me bzhin no //
analyzed: me shel gyi ni me bzhin no //
translated: like the heat of a magnifying glass.

original: gzugs la sogs pa yul la blo ste /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa yul la blo ste /
translated: The mind is the consciousness of form, etc.

original: gang mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: gang mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: It is the consciousness of the eye, etc.

original: de ni phyed pa po bdag gis bskyed pa ma yin te zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //üîΩrkyen la ltos pa ni /
analyzed: de ni phyed pa po bdag gis bskyed pa ma yin te zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'o // rkyen la ltos pa ni /
translated: It is not produced by the self, which is the experiencer, is what is to be established.üîΩThe mind that depends on conditions

original: rkyen la ltos pa'i blo ste /üîΩ'di'i skye ba ni rkyen la ltos pa'i skye ba yin no //
analyzed: rkyen la ltos pa'i blo ste / 'di'i skye ba ni rkyen la ltos pa'i skye ba yin no //
translated: is the mind that depends on conditions.üîΩIts arising is the arising that depends on conditions.

original: de'i ngo bo ni rkyen la ltos pa'i skye ba nyid do //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo ni rkyen la ltos pa'i skye ba nyid do //
translated: Its nature is the nature of the arising that depends on conditions.

original: des na rkyen la ltos pa'i skye ba yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: des na rkyen la ltos pa'i skye ba yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Therefore, because it is the arising that depends on conditions,üîΩfor example, like a magnifying glass, which is the condition for the arising of fire,

original: dper na nor bu me shel ni nyin par byed pa'i 'od kyis rig pa dang / ba lang gi lci ba skam po'i phye ma'i rkyen nye bar @257a * //
analyzed: dper na nor bu me shel ni nyin par byed pa'i 'od kyis rig pa dang / ba lang gi lci ba skam po'i phye ma'i rkyen nye bar @257a * //
translated: and like the arising of a sprout from the seed of a fruit.

original: gnas pa la brtan nas byed pa po bdag gis ma byas kyang bzod par dka' ba'i me'i phung po bskyed nas rtsva dang shing dang 'khri shing mang po rab tu rgyas par sreg pa dang / btso ba dang / bsal bar byed pa la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams byed do //üîΩde bzhin du yul dang / dbang po dang / rnam par shes pa dang / yid la byed pa'i tshogs pa la brten nas mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni byed pa po bdag gis ma bskyed kyang /
analyzed: gnas pa la brtan nas byed pa po bdag gis ma byas kyang bzod par dka' ba'i me'i phung po bskyed nas rtsva dang shing dang 'khri shing mang po rab tu rgyas par sreg pa dang / btso ba dang / bsal bar byed pa la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams byed do // de bzhin du yul dang / dbang po dang / rnam par shes pa dang / yid la byed pa'i tshogs pa la brten nas mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni byed pa po bdag gis ma bskyed kyang /
translated: Although the self, the agent, does not create it, it generates a mass of fire that is difficult to endure and performs the functions of burning, cooking, and drying the many grasses, trees, and vines that are spread out.üîΩIn the same way, although the eye consciousness and so on are not created by the self, the agent, they perform the functions of seeing, hearing, smelling, tasting, touching, and thinking in dependence on the assembly of the object, the sense faculty, and attention.

original: lta ba dang / mnyan pa dang / bsnams pa dang / myang ba dang / reg pa dang / yid la byed pa la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams byed na yul dang / dbang po dang / rnam par shes pa la ma gtogs pa'i bdag btags pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: lta ba dang / mnyan pa dang / bsnams pa dang / myang ba dang / reg pa dang / yid la byed pa la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams byed na yul dang / dbang po dang / rnam par shes pa la ma gtogs pa'i bdag btags pas ci zhig bya /
translated: If this is so, what purpose is there in positing a self that is not included within the object, the sense faculty, and the consciousness?

original: gzhan yang / gang yang yi ge'i bdag nyid sgra //
analyzed: gzhan yang / gang yang yi ge'i bdag nyid sgra //
translated: Moreover, the sound that has the nature of letters

original: de yi byed po bdag mi 'dod //
analyzed: de yi byed po bdag mi 'dod //
translated: The self is not accepted as the agent of that.

original: mnyan bya'i phyir dang sgra yin phyir //
analyzed: mnyan bya'i phyir dang sgra yin phyir //
translated: Because it is heard and because it is sound,

original: dper na brag ca ji bzhin no ;
analyzed: dper na brag ca ji bzhin no ;
translated: it is just like an echo.

original: / gang yang gnas dang byed pa dang // rtsol ba las kun du 'byung ba'i yi ge'i bdag nyid can gyi sgra kha'i sgo nas brjod pa de yang bdag gis byas pa ma yin te /
analyzed: / gang yang gnas dang byed pa dang // rtsol ba las kun du 'byung ba'i yi ge'i bdag nyid can gyi sgra kha'i sgo nas brjod pa de yang bdag gis byas pa ma yin te /
translated: The sound that has the nature of syllables that arises from a place, an instrument, and effort, and is expressed through the door of the mouth, is also not produced by the self.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rna ba'i dbang pos gzung bya yin pa'am /
analyzed: rna ba'i dbang pos gzung bya yin pa'am /
translated: Because it is apprehended by the ear faculty

original: sgra yin pa'i phyir dper na nags bsregs pa'i me'i sgra dang / rlung chen pos bskyod pa'i nags tshal gyi sgra'am /
analyzed: sgra yin pa'i phyir dper na nags bsregs pa'i me'i sgra dang / rlung chen pos bskyod pa'i nags tshal gyi sgra'am /
translated: and because it is sound, it is just like the sound of a fire that burns a forest, the sound of a forest stirred by a great wind,

original: rgya mtsho 'khrugs pa'am /
analyzed: rgya mtsho 'khrugs pa'am /
translated: the sound of a churning ocean,

original: ri'i 'bab chu drag pos rdo chen po bskyod pa'i sgra la sogs pa ri ngos sam /
analyzed: ri'i 'bab chu drag pos rdo chen po bskyod pa'i sgra la sogs pa ri ngos sam /
translated: or the sound of a great rock being moved by a strong mountain torrent.

original: brag skyibs dang nye ba la brten nas kun du byung ba'i sgra brnyan ni bdag gis byas pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: brag skyibs dang nye ba la brten nas kun du byung ba'i sgra brnyan ni bdag gis byas pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: The sound of an echo that arises in dependence on a mountainside or a rocky cliff is not produced by the self.

original: 'dis ni lus kyi bya ba gzhan //
analyzed: 'dis ni lus kyi bya ba gzhan //
translated: This also applies to other actions of the body.

original: 'ong ba dang ni 'gro ba dang // lag pa rkang pa g-yo ba ni //
analyzed: 'ong ba dang ni 'gro ba dang // lag pa rkang pa g-yo ba ni //
translated: The coming and going, the moving of the arms and legs,üîΩand the rest of the characteristics are refuted in the same way.

original: mtshan nyid lhag ma rnams kyang bkag / gang cung zhig lus las yang dag par 'byung ba'i 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa'i g-yo ba dang / btso blag dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal pa la sogs pa'i bya ba de dag thams cad rim pa 'di nyid kyis brtag pa byas pa yin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid lhag ma rnams kyang bkag / gang cung zhig lus las yang dag par 'byung ba'i 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa'i g-yo ba dang / btso blag dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal pa la sogs pa'i bya ba de dag thams cad rim pa 'di nyid kyis brtag pa byas pa yin no //
translated: All the activities that occur in the body, such as coming and going, the moving of the arms and legs, the activities of bathing, sitting, lying down, and so on, are to be investigated in the same way.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is this to be done?

original: ji ltar ri dang brag gi gse ba nas chu po'i rgyun byung nas yul du ma khyab par byed cing rgyas par 'byung ba na /
analyzed: ji ltar ri dang brag gi gse ba nas chu po'i rgyun byung nas yul du ma khyab par byed cing rgyas par 'byung ba na /
translated: For example, when water flows from a spring in a mountain or a cliff, it spreads out and flows to many places.

original: bdag med du zin kyang chu 'ong ngo zhe so tshig tu rjod par byed pa dang / @257b rtsva khyon chen por gnas pa'i phyogs gcig nas me mched pa na me byung ngo zhes tshig tu brjod par nyams su myong ba ltar de bzhin du 'dun pa'i rgyu can gyi 'bad pas bskyed pa'i rkang pa 'degs pa dang 'jog pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi bya
analyzed: bdag med du zin kyang chu 'ong ngo zhe so tshig tu rjod par byed pa dang / @257b rtsva khyon chen por gnas pa'i phyogs gcig nas me mched pa na me byung ngo zhes tshig tu brjod par nyams su myong ba ltar de bzhin du 'dun pa'i rgyu can gyi 'bad pas bskyed pa'i rkang pa 'degs pa dang 'jog pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi bya
translated: and when water comes, one says, ‚ÄúWater has come.‚ÄùüîΩAnd when a fire spreads from one part of a great field of grass, one says, ‚ÄúA fire has arisen.‚Äù

original: ba dang ldan pa'i 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las gyur ba'i 'dus pa la sna tshogs kyi bu dang / byams ma'i bu la sogs pa 'gro zhing 'ong ngo zhes bya ba'i brjod pa thob bo //
analyzed: ba dang ldan pa'i 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las gyur ba'i 'dus pa la sna tshogs kyi bu dang / byams ma'i bu la sogs pa 'gro zhing 'ong ngo zhes bya ba'i brjod pa thob bo //
translated: In the same way, when the body is endowed with the action of raising and lowering the foot, which is generated by effort that is caused by intention, the collection of primary elements and the derivative form is said to go and come, as in the expressions ‚ÄúThe son of a variety of people goes‚Äù and ‚ÄúThe son of Maitri goes.‚Äù

original: yang bdag med du zin kyang shing gi 'khrul 'khor gyi gzugs lag pa gnyis la mda' dang gzhu thogs nas 'phen pa dang / chu'i rgyun phan tshun brdab pa'i dbang gis bal ba ja thag pa ltar bsgril bar gyur pa dang / rdza bo'i nang du chu dang 'bras blugs shing mi btang nas skyabs dkrugs pa las 'bras chan tshos par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yang brag ca la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: yang bdag med du zin kyang shing gi 'khrul 'khor gyi gzugs lag pa gnyis la mda' dang gzhu thogs nas 'phen pa dang / chu'i rgyun phan tshun brdab pa'i dbang gis bal ba ja thag pa ltar bsgril bar gyur pa dang / rdza bo'i nang du chu dang 'bras blugs shing mi btang nas skyabs dkrugs pa las 'bras chan tshos par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yang brag ca la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: Again, even if one does not exist, the form of a wooden machine, holding an arrow and a bow in two hands, shoots the arrow, and by the power of the mutual impact of the stream of water, the water is twisted like a rope of jute, and in a clay pot, water and rice are poured and a man is sent, and the rice is cooked by the churning of the water.

original: des na lus dang dbang po las ma gtogs pa'i bdag ni yod pa ma yin te /üîΩrnam par bcad nas kun shes las //
analyzed: des na lus dang dbang po las ma gtogs pa'i bdag ni yod pa ma yin te / rnam par bcad nas kun shes las //
translated: Therefore, the self does not exist apart from the body and the sense faculties.üîΩFrom the complete knowledge of the elimination,

original: kun shes dran pa nyid las dran //
analyzed: kun shes dran pa nyid las dran //
translated: from the complete knowledge of the elimination itself, there is recollection.

original: so sor rnam par rab shes las //
analyzed: so sor rnam par rab shes las //
translated: From the thorough knowledge of each,

original: shes rab nyams su myong la tshor //
analyzed: shes rab nyams su myong la tshor //
translated: from the thorough knowledge of each, there is feeling that experiences wisdom.

original: yul dang dbang po dang rnam par shes pa dang / yid la byed pa'i rkyen tshogs pa las rab tu byung ba nyid kyi ljon shing dang / grong khyer dang / ri dang / skyes bu dang ri dvags la sogs pa'i rnam par yongs su gcod pa'i 'du shes las 'du shes 'byung la /
analyzed: yul dang dbang po dang rnam par shes pa dang / yid la byed pa'i rkyen tshogs pa las rab tu byung ba nyid kyi ljon shing dang / grong khyer dang / ri dang / skyes bu dang ri dvags la sogs pa'i rnam par yongs su gcod pa'i 'du shes las 'du shes 'byung la /
translated: The idea of a tree, a city, a mountain, a man, an animal, etc. arises from the combination of the conditions of object, sense faculty, consciousness, and attention.

original: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug gis nyams su myong ba'i yul dran pa las ni dran pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug gis nyams su myong ba'i yul dran pa las ni dran pa'o //
translated: Memory is from the recollection of an object experienced by the six collections of consciousness.

original: chos rnams kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid so so'i char rab tu 'byed pa'i rnam pa rab kyi mthar phyin pa nyid kyi shes rab las shes rab bo //üîΩbde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal yang ma yin /
analyzed: chos rnams kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid so so'i char rab tu 'byed pa'i rnam pa rab kyi mthar phyin pa nyid kyi shes rab las shes rab bo // bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal yang ma yin /
translated: Wisdom is from the perfection of the discernment of the individual characteristics and general characteristics of phenomena.

original: bde ba yang ma yin par yul nyams su myong ba las ni tshor ba ste /
analyzed: bde ba yang ma yin par yul nyams su myong ba las ni tshor ba ste /
translated: Feeling is from the experience of an object that is pleasant, unpleasant, or neither.

original: 'du shes dang / dran pa dang / shes rab dang / tshor ba la sogs pa las ma gtogs pa'i bdag gi bya ba gzhan zhig ngo bo nyid nges par gzung bar mi nus te ;
analyzed: 'du shes dang / dran pa dang / shes rab dang / tshor ba la sogs pa las ma gtogs pa'i bdag gi bya ba gzhan zhig ngo bo nyid nges par gzung bar mi nus te ;
translated: Apart from perception, memory, wisdom, feeling, and so on, no other activity of the self can be ascertained as its essence.

original: nam mkha'i me tog bzhin du de ni yod pa ma yin pas gzung bar bya'o //üîΩdngos po'i ngo bo rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sems dang / dngos po'i khyad par so sor rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sems las byung ba tshor ba dang / 'dun pa dang / reg pa dang / @258a * //
analyzed: nam mkha'i me tog bzhin du de ni yod pa ma yin pas gzung bar bya'o // dngos po'i ngo bo rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sems dang / dngos po'i khyad par so sor rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sems las byung ba tshor ba dang / 'dun pa dang / reg pa dang / @258a * //
translated: Like a sky flower, it does not exist, and therefore it cannot be apprehended.

original: ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa dang / mos pa la sogs pa sems dang sems las byung ba bstan par ma gtogs pa'i skyes bu'i bya ba ni phra mo tsam yang dmigs par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa dang / mos pa la sogs pa sems dang sems las byung ba bstan par ma gtogs pa'i skyes bu'i bya ba ni phra mo tsam yang dmigs par mi 'gyur la /
translated: Apart from the mind, which has the character of being conscious of the nature of things, and mental factors, which have the character of being conscious of the specific attributes of things, no other activity of a person can be observed, not even a subtle one.

original: 'di dag las ma gtogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo yang 'ga' yang nye bar mi dmigs pas /
analyzed: 'di dag las ma gtogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo yang 'ga' yang nye bar mi dmigs pas /
translated: Apart from these, no essence of a person can be observed.

original: des na gang gi phyir 'di dag gi yod par sgrub pa nyid ni 'grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na gang gi phyir 'di dag gi yod par sgrub pa nyid ni 'grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since the existence of these is not established,

original: 'di skad smra bar yang nus te /
analyzed: 'di skad smra bar yang nus te /
translated: one can say this:

original: bdag ni bden par yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bdag ni bden par yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The self does not truly exist,

original: bya ba'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
analyzed: bya ba'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
translated: because it does not have the character of being an agent, like a sky flower.

original: gal te 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: gal te 'dir smras pa /
translated: If someone says this,

original: skyes bu kho nas mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / snom pa dang / myang ba dang / snyam sems pa dang / kun du shes pa dang / dran pa dang / kun nas tshor ba yin te /
analyzed: skyes bu kho nas mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / snom pa dang / myang ba dang / snyam sems pa dang / kun du shes pa dang / dran pa dang / kun nas tshor ba yin te /
translated: then a person sees, hears, smells, tastes, touches, cognizes, remembers, and feels.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: shes pa la sogs pa rnams ni byed par bstan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa la sogs pa rnams ni byed par bstan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is taught that consciousness and so on are agents.

original: gang gi phyir sgra'i bstan bcos kyi mtshan nyid ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir sgra'i bstan bcos kyi mtshan nyid ni 'di yin te /
translated: The definition of a treatise on grammar is this:

original: byed pa po dang / las dang ; byed pa dang / yang dag par sbyin pa dang / gang las 'ongs pa dang / dbang du bya ba'i ngo bo zhes bya ba'i byed pa ma lus pa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni rang dbang can gyi byed pa po ste byed pa po ste byed pa po de yod pa las de las gzhan pa'i byed pa'i khyad par rnams yin te /üîΩdes nas skyes bu ni byed pa po yin la /
analyzed: byed pa po dang / las dang ; byed pa dang / yang dag par sbyin pa dang / gang las 'ongs pa dang / dbang du bya ba'i ngo bo zhes bya ba'i byed pa ma lus pa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni rang dbang can gyi byed pa po ste byed pa po ste byed pa po de yod pa las de las gzhan pa'i byed pa'i khyad par rnams yin te / des nas skyes bu ni byed pa po yin la /
translated: The agent, the object, the action, the proper giving, the source, and the nature of the object of control‚Äîall these are preceded by the independent agent.

original: de'i mig la sogs pa ni byed par gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i mig la sogs pa ni byed par gyur pa yin te /
translated: The agent is the person, and his eyes, etc., are the instruments.

original: de ni de dag nas skar khung mang po btod pa'i khang pa na gnas pa'i skyes bu bzhin du sgo gang dang nye bar gnas pa'i yul la rjes su mtshon par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni de dag nas skar khung mang po btod pa'i khang pa na gnas pa'i skyes bu bzhin du sgo gang dang nye bar gnas pa'i yul la rjes su mtshon par byed pa yin no //
translated: The person is like a man in a house with many windows who sees various objects with his eyes, which are like windows.

original: ji ltar zor bas gcod par byed do zhes bya ba yang zer ba kho nas gcod pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: ji ltar zor bas gcod par byed do zhes bya ba yang zer ba kho nas gcod pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Just as it is said that a scythe cuts, but the scythe alone does not cut,

original: 'on kyang byed pa zor bas lhas byin gyis gcod par byed do zhes bya ba bzhin du mig gis mthong ngo zhes bya ba yang mig kho nas mthong ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang byed pa zor bas lhas byin gyis gcod par byed do zhes bya ba bzhin du mig gis mthong ngo zhes bya ba yang mig kho nas mthong ba ni ma yin te /
translated: But just as it is said that Devadatta cuts with a sword, so it is said that the eye sees. But the eye does not see by itself.

original: 'on kyang byed pa des skyes bus mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang byed pa des skyes bus mthong ba yin no //
translated: But it is the person who sees by means of that instrument.

original: de bzhin du rna bas thos pa'i sgror gyur pa nas skyes bus thos pa yin gyis /
analyzed: de bzhin du rna bas thos pa'i sgror gyur pa nas skyes bus thos pa yin gyis /
translated: In the same way, the ear hears the sound that has come into its range, but it is the person who hears.

original: rna ba kho na ni ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: rna ba kho na ni ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
translated: The ear does not hear by itself.

original: de ltar na tshul 'di ltar bya ba 'grub pa yin te 'dis mthong bas na mig go //
analyzed: de ltar na tshul 'di ltar bya ba 'grub pa yin te 'dis mthong bas na mig go //
translated: In this way, the meaning of the words is established in this way: it is the eye because it sees;

original: 'dis thos pas na rna ba'o zhes bya ba nas ji srid du /
analyzed: 'dis thos pas na rna ba'o zhes bya ba nas ji srid du /
translated: it is the ear because it hears; and so on up to:

original: 'dis myong bas na tshor ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'dis myong bas na tshor ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o zhe na /
translated: it is feeling because it feels.

original: de la brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de la brjod par bya ste /
translated: To this we reply:

original: shes @258b sogs byed par smra zhe na //üîΩbyed pa nyid du sgrub pa'am //
analyzed: shes @258b sogs byed par smra zhe na // byed pa nyid du sgrub pa'am //
translated: If you say that consciousness and so on are agents,üîΩyou must prove that they are agents,

original: de las gzhan pa'i byed po nyid //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i byed po nyid //
translated: or that they are something other than agents,

original: gcod byed bzhin du rigs ldan min //
analyzed: gcod byed bzhin du rigs ldan min //
translated: but they are not like a sword, which is suitable as an instrument.

original: ci ltar rigs pa dang mi ldan zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar rigs pa dang mi ldan zhe na /
translated: How is it not reasonable?

original: byed pa po la rkyen ldan gyi //
analyzed: byed pa po la rkyen ldan gyi //
translated: The conditions are not for the agent.

original: gang phyir byed pa la min pas //üîΩdes na gtan tshigs ma grub pa'am //
analyzed: gang phyir byed pa la min pas // des na gtan tshigs ma grub pa'am //
translated: Because it is not for the action.üîΩTherefore, the reason is not established,

original: ma nges pa nyid yin par 'gyur //
analyzed: ma nges pa nyid yin par 'gyur //
translated: or it is inconclusive.

original: mig ni rang nyid kyis lta ba yin gyi /
analyzed: mig ni rang nyid kyis lta ba yin gyi /
translated: The eye sees by itself.

original: yang gzhan gyi byed pa ni ma yin no //üîΩnyan pas na rna ba /üîΩsnom pas na sna /
analyzed: yang gzhan gyi byed pa ni ma yin no // nyan pas na rna ba / snom pas na sna /
translated: It is not the action of another.üîΩIt hears, therefore it is the ear.

original: myang bas na lte /
analyzed: myang bas na lte /
translated: It smells, therefore it is the nose.üîΩIt tastes, therefore it is the tongue.

original: reg par byed pas na reg pa /
analyzed: reg par byed pas na reg pa /
translated: It touches, therefore it is the body.

original: snyam du sems pa na nyid /
analyzed: snyam du sems pa na nyid /
translated: It thinks, therefore it is the mind.

original: kun shes pas na 'du shes //
analyzed: kun shes pas na 'du shes //
translated: It understands, therefore it is perception.

original: dran pa byed pas na dran pa /
analyzed: dran pa byed pas na dran pa /
translated: It remembers, therefore it is memory.

original: so sor shes pas shes rab yin te /
analyzed: so sor shes pas shes rab yin te /
translated: It discriminates, therefore it is wisdom.

original: de'i phyir na shes pa la sogs pa byed par bstan pa la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs 'di dag gi don ma grub pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir na shes pa la sogs pa byed par bstan pa la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs 'di dag gi don ma grub pa nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore, the reasons such as ‚Äúbecause it is taught that consciousness and so on are agents‚Äù are not established.

original: yang na mi mthun pa la yang zhugs pa'i phyir ma nges pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: yang na mi mthun pa la yang zhugs pa'i phyir ma nges pa nyid yin no //
translated: Or, because they are also found in the dissimilar instances, they are inconclusive.

original: mig kho nas mthong ba yin gyi /
analyzed: mig kho nas mthong ba yin gyi /
translated: Only the eye sees.

original: 'on kyang byed pa des bdag gis mthong ba yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang byed pa des bdag gis mthong ba yin te /
translated: But the self is seen by that which is the agent.

original: shes pa la sogs pa byed par bstan pa'i phyir ji ltar zor bas gcod ces bya ba lta bu'o zhes gzhan gyis smras pa de la kho bos lan brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: shes pa la sogs pa byed par bstan pa'i phyir ji ltar zor bas gcod ces bya ba lta bu'o zhes gzhan gyis smras pa de la kho bos lan brjod par bya ste /
translated: In response to the opponent‚Äôs statement, ‚ÄúThe self is the agent of seeing and so on because it is taught to be the agent of seeing and so on, just as in the statement ‚ÄòHe cuts with a sword,‚Äô ‚Äù we reply as follows:

original: mig kho nas mthong ba yin gyi bdag gis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mig kho nas mthong ba yin gyi bdag gis ni ma yin te /
translated: The eye sees, not the self,

original: byed pa por bstan pa yin pa'i phyir ji ltar lhas byin gyis gcod ces bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: byed pa por bstan pa yin pa'i phyir ji ltar lhas byin gyis gcod ces bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: because it is taught to be the agent, just as in the statement ‚ÄúDevadatta cuts.‚Äù

original: des na smras pa /
analyzed: des na smras pa /
translated: The opponent says:

original: shes la sogs pa byed po nyid //
analyzed: shes la sogs pa byed po nyid //
translated: The self is the agent of seeing and so on

original: byed po'i sgra yis brjod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: byed po'i sgra yis brjod pa'i phyir //
translated: because it is expressed by the term ‚Äúagent.‚Äù

original: lhas byin gyis ni gcod do zhes //
analyzed: lhas byin gyis ni gcod do zhes //
translated: Just as in the statement ‚ÄúDevadatta cuts,‚Äù

original: ji ltar byed por mthong ba bzhin //
analyzed: ji ltar byed por mthong ba bzhin //
translated: the self is seen to be the agent.

original: gal te lhas byin gyis gcod pa ma yin gyi ral gris gcod pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te lhas byin gyis gcod pa ma yin gyi ral gris gcod pa yin te /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúDevadatta does not cut; the sword cuts,‚Äù

original: des na 'di ni rigs pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na 'di ni rigs pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: then this is illogical.

original: mi rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mi rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not illogical.

original: bdag gi phyir byed pa po dang las dang / tshogs pa las 'dir bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag gi phyir byed pa po dang las dang / tshogs pa las 'dir bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the agent, object, and collection of conditions are for the sake of the action.

original: de la res 'ga' ni byed pa po gtso bor ston par byed de /
analyzed: de la res 'ga' ni byed pa po gtso bor ston par byed de /
translated: Sometimes the agent is emphasized,

original: lhas byin gyis gcod ces bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: lhas byin gyis gcod ces bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: as in the statement ‚ÄúDevadatta cuts.‚Äù

original: res 'ga' ni byed pa gtso bor ston par byed de /
analyzed: res 'ga' ni byed pa gtso bor ston par byed de /
translated: Sometimes the object is emphasized,

original: ral gris bcad do zhes bya ba lta bu ste /
analyzed: ral gris bcad do zhes bya ba lta bu ste /
translated: as in the statement ‚ÄúThe tree is cut with an axe.‚Äù

original: gcod pa'i bya ba ni gnyi ga la ltos pa yin te /üîΩbyed pa po med par byed pas kyang ma yin la /üîΩbyed pa med pa'i byed pa pos kyang ma yin pas 'di dag gnyi g-yang las lan ltos par byed pa po dang byed pa zhes bya bar @259a * //
analyzed: gcod pa'i bya ba ni gnyi ga la ltos pa yin te / byed pa po med par byed pas kyang ma yin la / byed pa med pa'i byed pa pos kyang ma yin pas 'di dag gnyi g-yang las lan ltos par byed pa po dang byed pa zhes bya bar @259a * //
translated: The action of cutting depends on both,üîΩbecause there is no action without an agent,

original: bstan pa 'thob pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bstan pa 'thob pa ma yin no //
translated: and there is no agent without an action. Therefore, neither the agent nor the action is established in dependence on the other.

original: de lta bas na rkyen tshogs pa las dngos po mngon par 'grub pa yod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de lta bas na rkyen tshogs pa las dngos po mngon par 'grub pa yod pa yin gyi /
translated: Thus, things are established from the collection of conditions,

original: 'di la gtso bo ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di la gtso bo ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: but there is no principal at all.

original: gzhan du na nye bar btags pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du na nye bar btags pa nyid yin no //
translated: Otherwise, it would be a mere designation.

original: skyes bu ni nye bar mi dmigs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir tshogs par gtogs pa ma yin par byed pa por bstan du yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar smras pa /
analyzed: skyes bu ni nye bar mi dmigs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir tshogs par gtogs pa ma yin par byed pa por bstan du yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar smras pa /
translated: Since a person is not perceived, it is not tenable to indicate it as an agent that is included in the collection.

original: 'dus byas phung po byed bral nyid //
analyzed: 'dus byas phung po byed bral nyid //
translated: The collection of conditioned factors is devoid of action.

original: 'di la byed por brjod bya ste //üîΩbyed pa yin phyir mar me yis //
analyzed: 'di la byed por brjod bya ste // byed pa yin phyir mar me yis //
translated: It is said that it is the agent.üîΩJust as a lamp is the illuminator

original: gsal bar byed pa yin pa bzhin //
analyzed: gsal bar byed pa yin pa bzhin //
translated: because it is the action of illumination.

original: 'dus byas kyi cha'i tshogs pa ni bya ba dang bral ba yin du zin kyang byed pa po nyid du yod de /
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi cha'i tshogs pa ni bya ba dang bral ba yin du zin kyang byed pa po nyid du yod de /
translated: Even though the collection of conditioned factors is devoid of action, it is the agent.

original: bya ba yin pa'i phyir dper na mar me byed pa por mthong ba bzhin no //
analyzed: bya ba yin pa'i phyir dper na mar me byed pa por mthong ba bzhin no //
translated: Because it is the action, just as a lamp is seen to be the agent.

original: ji ltar snum dang / sdong bu dang / snod dang / me'i rkyen las mngon par grub pa'i mar me ni bya ba dang bral du zin kyang gsal bar byed pas na byed pa po zhes bya bar bstan pa yang 'thob po //
analyzed: ji ltar snum dang / sdong bu dang / snod dang / me'i rkyen las mngon par grub pa'i mar me ni bya ba dang bral du zin kyang gsal bar byed pas na byed pa po zhes bya bar bstan pa yang 'thob po //
translated: Just as a lamp is established from the conditions of oil, wick, container, and fire, even though it is devoid of action, it is called the agent because it illuminates.

original: de bzhin du lus dang / ngag dang / yid 'dus pa'i cha 'di dag kyang bya ba dang bral du zin kyang /
analyzed: de bzhin du lus dang / ngag dang / yid 'dus pa'i cha 'di dag kyang bya ba dang bral du zin kyang /
translated: Likewise, although the components of the body, speech, and mind are devoid of activity,

original: yul dang dbang po dang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen tshogs pa'i dbang gis byed pa po zhes bstan pa nyams su myong ba yin no //
analyzed: yul dang dbang po dang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen tshogs pa'i dbang gis byed pa po zhes bstan pa nyams su myong ba yin no //
translated: due to the power of the assembly of conditions of objects, sense faculties, and consciousness, the experience of the so-called agent is observed.

original: 'dir gzhan gyis smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir gzhan gyis smras pa /
translated: Here an opponent might say,

original: bdag nyid ni mchog yin te /
analyzed: bdag nyid ni mchog yin te /
translated: the self is supreme,

original: gtso bo'i byed pa po de la ltos pa nyid kyang bya ba thams cad la 'jug pa nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: gtso bo'i byed pa po de la ltos pa nyid kyang bya ba thams cad la 'jug pa nyid yin gyi /
translated: because it is in dependence on that primary agent that all activities are engaged.

original: mar me la sogs pa ni nye bar btags pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: mar me la sogs pa ni nye bar btags pa nyid yin te /
translated: But a lamp and so on are merely imputed as agents.

original: ji ltar rdza mkhan gyis sa la sogs pa rkyen mang po nye bar gnas kyang rdza mkhan nyid byed pa por gyur pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar rdza mkhan gyis sa la sogs pa rkyen mang po nye bar gnas kyang rdza mkhan nyid byed pa por gyur pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Just as in dependence on many conditions such as a potter, clay, and so on, the potter is the agent.

original: brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste /
translated: We reply:

original: yang dag gtso gcig byed po min //
analyzed: yang dag gtso gcig byed po min //
translated: The primary one is not the agent,

original: gang phyir gcig gis bum mi byed //üîΩdes na mar me sogs byed po //
analyzed: gang phyir gcig gis bum mi byed // des na mar me sogs byed po //
translated: because one alone does not make the pot.üîΩTherefore we do not assert that a lamp and so on

original: gdags pa bar ni mi 'dod do //
analyzed: gdags pa bar ni mi 'dod do //
translated: are agents in the sense of being imputed.

original: kun rdzob nyid du ni rkyen rnams tshogs par byed pa po yin par ston pa /
analyzed: kun rdzob nyid du ni rkyen rnams tshogs par byed pa po yin par ston pa /
translated: In terms of the relative, the creator is the assembly of conditions.

original: dpyad pas kyang rtogs shing de ltar smras pa yang yin no //
analyzed: dpyad pas kyang rtogs shing de ltar smras pa yang yin no //
translated: This is understood through analysis and is also what we say.

original: don dam par ni gtso bo'i byed pa po nyid yin par 'ga' yang mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: don dam par ni gtso bo'i byed pa po nyid yin par 'ga' yang mi 'grub ste /
translated: But in terms of the ultimate, no one can establish that the self is the creator.

original: gang gi phyir rgyu gcig gis bum pa mngon par sgrub par nus pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rgyu gcig gis bum pa mngon par sgrub par nus pa ma yin gyi /
translated: This is because a single cause is not capable of producing a pot.

original: 'jim pa'i gong bu dang / dbyug pa dang / 'khor lo dang / skud pa dang / chu dang / rdza mkhan gyi 'dod pa la sogs pa'i @259b rkyen mang po tshogs pa las bum pa rab tu 'grub pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'jim pa'i gong bu dang / dbyug pa dang / 'khor lo dang / skud pa dang / chu dang / rdza mkhan gyi 'dod pa la sogs pa'i @259b rkyen mang po tshogs pa las bum pa rab tu 'grub pa nyid yin no //
translated: A pot is produced from the assembly of many conditions, such as a lump of clay, a stick, a wheel, a string, water, the potter‚Äôs desire, and so on.

original: de bzhin du bdag gcig pu bya ba dang / rtsom pa thams cad mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag gcig pu bya ba dang / rtsom pa thams cad mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
translated: In the same way, the self alone is not the cause for the production of all actions and endeavors.

original: rgyu tshogs pa du ma la ltos pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rgyu tshogs pa du ma la ltos pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: This is because they depend on the assembly of many causes.

original: dngos po thams cad ces bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad ces bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: This is to be applied to all things.

original: mar me la sogs pa dang / mig la sogs pa ni btags pa pa'i byed pa po nyid ma yin gyi /
analyzed: mar me la sogs pa dang / mig la sogs pa ni btags pa pa'i byed pa po nyid ma yin gyi /
translated: The light of a butterlamp and so on, and the eye and so on are not the creator imputedly.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: gtso bo nyid yin te /
analyzed: gtso bo nyid yin te /
translated: They are the principal creator.

original: de las gzhan pa'i gtso bo'i byed pa po ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i gtso bo'i byed pa po ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the principal creator other than that is not established.

original: gal te yang 'di skad du /
analyzed: gal te yang 'di skad du /
translated: If it is said,

original: 'di ni de kho na nyid kyi dbang du byas pa yin pas /
analyzed: 'di ni de kho na nyid kyi dbang du byas pa yin pas /
translated: ‚ÄúThis is from the perspective of reality.

original: skad cig ma nyid kyis 'jig pa ni byed pa med pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid kyis 'jig pa ni byed pa med pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the destruction by momentariness is without activity,

original: byas pa'i shugs kyis rgyun la bcings pa dang grol ba mi 'thad pas bdag kho na bcings pa dang grol ba dang / gnas pa'i rten yin par she spar bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: byas pa'i shugs kyis rgyun la bcings pa dang grol ba mi 'thad pas bdag kho na bcings pa dang grol ba dang / gnas pa'i rten yin par she spar bya'o zhe na /
translated: it is not tenable that the continuum is bound and liberated by the power of being produced. Therefore, the self alone is the basis of bondage and liberation and of abiding.‚Äù

original: de la brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de la brjod par bya ste /
translated: To that, we reply:

original: skad cig ma re re so sor 'jig cing rang dbang med pa yin na yang rang gi ngo bo dang bral pa thog ma med pa'i dus nas chu bo'i rgyun bzhin du gnas pa'i /
analyzed: skad cig ma re re so sor 'jig cing rang dbang med pa yin na yang rang gi ngo bo dang bral pa thog ma med pa'i dus nas chu bo'i rgyun bzhin du gnas pa'i /
translated: Even though each moment is individually destroyed and is without independence, it is like the flow of a river that has been without a beginning abiding by being devoid of its own entity.

original: 'dod chags sogs kyi dbang phyug sems //
analyzed: 'dod chags sogs kyi dbang phyug sems //
translated: The mind is the lord of attachment and so on.

original: gzugs sogs yul la mngon zhen pa'i //
analyzed: gzugs sogs yul la mngon zhen pa'i //
translated: The object, form, etc., is clung to,

original: thar pa mi mthun phyogs kyis phrogs //
analyzed: thar pa mi mthun phyogs kyis phrogs //
translated: and liberation is carried off by its opposite.

original: 'khor ba'i brtson rar bcings pa yin ;
analyzed: 'khor ba'i brtson rar bcings pa yin ;
translated: One is bound in the prison of cyclic existence.

original: / khyod kyis btags pa'i bdag ni med du zin kyang /
analyzed: / khyod kyis btags pa'i bdag ni med du zin kyang /
translated: Even though the self imputed by you does not exist,

original: sems nyid yul yid du 'ong ba dang / yul yid du mi 'ong ba la phrad pa dang 'bral bar 'dun pa'i yongs su gdung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i lcags sgrog gis srid pa gsum gyi btson rar yang dag par bsdams pas rang dbang mid par gyur pa /
analyzed: sems nyid yul yid du 'ong ba dang / yul yid du mi 'ong ba la phrad pa dang 'bral bar 'dun pa'i yongs su gdung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i lcags sgrog gis srid pa gsum gyi btson rar yang dag par bsdams pas rang dbang mid par gyur pa /
translated: the mind itself is well bound in the prison of the three worlds by the iron fetters of the afflictions, which are the desires to meet with and separate from attractive and unattractive objects, respectively.

original: shes rab kyi snang ba med pas thar pa'i lam mi shes pa ni bcings pa zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi snang ba med pas thar pa'i lam mi shes pa ni bcings pa zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Since it lacks the light of wisdom, it does not know the path of liberation. It should be called ‚Äúbound.‚Äù

original: kun rdzob tu ni /üîΩsems las byung bas bslang ba la //
analyzed: kun rdzob tu ni / sems las byung bas bslang ba la //
translated: Conventionally,

original: lag pa la sogs tshogs pa ni //
analyzed: lag pa la sogs tshogs pa ni //
translated: the collection of hands, etc.,

original: sems bcas sems can zhes bya ste //
analyzed: sems bcas sems can zhes bya ste //
translated: is called ‚Äúsentient being‚Äù

original: gtong ba la sogs sems 'byung ba //
analyzed: gtong ba la sogs sems 'byung ba //
translated: because it is motivated by mental factors.

original: yod pa gtong po la sogs brjod //
analyzed: yod pa gtong po la sogs brjod //
translated: The giver, etc., are said to existüîΩbecause the mental factors of giving, etc., exist.

original: mgo dang / mig dang / kha dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa la sogs pa 'dus pa nyid mngon sum du mngon par gyur pa nyid 'dod pa dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog gi 'ching ba las grol bar gyur pa /
analyzed: mgo dang / mig dang / kha dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa la sogs pa 'dus pa nyid mngon sum du mngon par gyur pa nyid 'dod pa dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog gi 'ching ba las grol bar gyur pa /
translated: The mind is a collection of prior and subsequent moments.üîΩThe mind is a collection of prior and subsequent moments.

original: @260a * // phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyis dngos po gtong ba'i sems 'byung bar gyur pa la sbyin pa dag ces rjod par byed la /
analyzed: @260a * // phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyis dngos po gtong ba'i sems 'byung bar gyur pa la sbyin pa dag ces rjod par byed la /
translated: The mind is a collection of prior and subsequent moments.üîΩThe mind is a collection of prior and subsequent moments.üîΩThe mind is a collection of prior and subsequent moments.üîΩThe mind is a collection of prior and subsequent moments.üîΩThe mind is a collection of prior and subsequent moments.

original: chags pa'i sems kyis bcings pa'i blo can 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa 'dus pa la ni 'dzin chags can zhes zer ro //
analyzed: chags pa'i sems kyis bcings pa'i blo can 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa 'dus pa la ni 'dzin chags can zhes zer ro //

original: de bzhin du gzhan dag gi srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa la sogs pa las ldog pa la sogs pas legs par bsdams pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi tshogs kyis phung po'i rgyun ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan dag gi srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa la sogs pa las ldog pa la sogs pas legs par bsdams pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi tshogs kyis phung po'i rgyun ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The

original: sems las byung ba thams cad la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems las byung ba thams cad la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The same should be applied to all mental factors.

original: de bzhin du gtong ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba dang gtong ba dang / mngon par ldan pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du gtong ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba dang gtong ba dang / mngon par ldan pa la yang ngo //
translated: Similarly, the application of giving, etc., giving, and the possession of giving, etc.,

original: rig pa skyes pas ma rig sogs //
analyzed: rig pa skyes pas ma rig sogs //
translated: The arising of knowledge is the cessation of ignorance, etc.

original: kun sbyor ldog par gyur ba'i phyir //
analyzed: kun sbyor ldog par gyur ba'i phyir //
translated: Because of the cessation of the fetters,
